pustuláʃːá éʃ átokːá lɛsnɛk éʃ mɛɡsɒɡːɒtːɒd ɒ tɛ ruháidɒt éʃ ʃírtál ɛlõtːɛm ɒzért iʃ mɛɡhɒlːɡɒtːɒlɒk ɒzt mondjɒ ɒz ɒzért téɡɛd ɒ tɛ ɒcáidhoz ɟûjtɛlɛk éʃ ɒ tɛ ʃírodbɒ békɛʃːéɡːɛl visnɛk téɡɛd éʃ mɛɡ nɛm ɒ tɛ sɛmɛid ɒzt ɒ nɒɟ vɛsɛdɛlmɛt ɒ mɛjɛt ɛ hɛjrɛ Éʃ mɛɡvitːék ɒ kirájnɒk ɒ válɒst Éʃ ɛlküldötː ɒ kiráj éʃ hozːá ɟûltɛk júdánɒk éʃ jɛruʒálɛmnɛk mindɛn vénɛi Éʃ fɛlmɛnt ɒ kiráj ɒz házábɒ éʃ júdából mindɛn éʃ jɛruʒálɛm mindɛn lɒkoʃɒ vɛlɛ ɒ pɒpok ɒ éʃ ɒz ɛɡés kit͡ʃiɲtõl foɡvɒ nɒɟiɡ Éʃ mindɛn bɛsédét ɛlolvɒʃá ɛlõtːök ɒ sövɛtʃéɡ köɲvénɛk ɒ mɛj mɛɡtɒláltɒtotː ɒz házábɒn Éʃ odɒ álːotː ɒ kiráj ɒz ɛmɛlvéɲrɛ éʃ kötéʃt ɒz ɛlõtː hoɟ ɒz urɒt ɒkɒrják kövɛtni éʃ ɒz pɒrɒnt͡ʃolɒtɒit bizoɲʃáɡtétɛlɛit éʃ rɛndɛléʃɛit tɛljɛʃ sívbõl éʃ lélɛkbõl mɛɡõrizni éʃ bɛtɛljɛʃítɛni ɛ sövɛtʃéɡ bɛsédɛit ɒ mɛjɛk mɛɡ vɒnːɒk írvɒ ɒbːɒn ɒ köɲvbɛn éʃ ráálːotː ɒz ɛɡés ɒ kötéʃrɛ Éʃ mɛɡpɒrɒnt͡ʃolá ɒ kiráj hilkiánɒk ɒ fõpɒpnɒk éʃ ɒ máʃod rɛndbɛli pɒpoknɒk éʃ ɒz ɒjtóõrizõknɛk hoɟ ɒz tɛmplomából hordjɒnɒk mindɛn ɛdéɲt ɒ mɛjɛt ɒ bɒálnɒk ɒz ɒʃɛránɒk éʃ ɒz ɛɡés mɛɲːɛi ʃɛrɛɡnɛk t͡ʃináltɒk éʃ mɛɡéɡɛté ɒzokɒt jɛruʒálɛmɛn ɒ kidron völɟébɛn éʃ ɒzok hɒmvɒit béthɛlbɛ ɒ bálváɲ pɒpokɒt iʃ ɒ kikɛt júdɒ kirájɒi álːítotːɒk bɛ hoɟ ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒtokon tömjénɛzːɛnɛk júdɒ vároʃɒibɒn éʃ jɛruʒálɛm éʃ mindɒzokɒt iʃ ɒ ɒ bɒálnɒk ɒ nɒpnɒk holdnɒk éɡi jɛlɛknɛk éʃ ɒz ɛɡés mɛɲːɛi ʃɛrɛɡnɛk tömjénɛztɛk kivivé ɒz ɒz ɒʃɛrát iʃ jɛruʒálɛmɛn ɒ kidron pɒtɒkjɒ mɛlːé éʃ mɛɡéɡɛté ɒzt ɒ kidron völɟébɛn éʃ porːá zúztɒ éʃ ɒnːɒk ɒ köʒéɡ tɛmɛtõhɛjérɛ Éʃ lɛrontá ɒ pɒráznák házɒit ɒ mɛjɛk ɒz házɒ mɛlːɛtː voltɒk éʃ ɒ mɛjɛkbɛn ɒz ɒsːoɲok kárpitokɒt sõtːɛk ɒz ɒʃɛránɒk Éʃ bɛhozɒtːɒ ɒz ösːɛʃ pɒpokɒt júdɒ vároʃɒiból éʃ mɛɡfɛrtéztɛtːɛ ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒtokɒt ɒ mɛjɛkɛn ɒ pɒpok tömjénɛztɛk ɡɛbától ɛɡés bɛɛrʃɛbáiɡ éʃ lɛrontotːɒ ɒ kɒpuk mɛlːɛtː lɛvõ mɒɡɒʃlɒtokɒt iʃ ɒ mɛjɛk jóʒuénɒk ɒ vároʃ fɛjɛdɛlménɛk kɒpujɒ ɛlõtː voltɒk bɒlkéz fɛlõl ɒ vároʃ kɒpujábɒn dɛ ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒtok pɒpjɒi ʃohɒ ʃɛm áldoztɒk ɒz jɛruʒálɛmbɛn hɒnɛm ɒ kovástɒlɒn kɛɲɛrɛt ɒz ɒcjokfiɒi közötː ɛtːék mɛɡfɛrtõztɛtːɛ ɒ tófɛtɛt ɒ hinːom fiɒinɒk völɟébɛn hoɟ ʃɛnki ɒz vɒɟ lɛáɲát nɛ vihɛʃːɛ ɒ moloknɒk Éʃ ɛltávolítotːɒ ɒ lovɒkɒt ɒ mɛjɛkɛt júdɒ kirájɒi ɒ nɒpnɒk sɛntɛltɛk ɒz házánɒk bɛmɛnɛtɛlénél ɒ nátánmélɛk udvɒri solɡɒ házɒ mɛlːɛtː ɒ mɛj ɒ phɒrvɒrimbɒn éʃ ɒ nɒp sɛkɛrɛit tûzːɛl ɛléɡɛtːɛ Éʃ ɒz oltárokɒt ɒ mɛjɛk ɒz ɒkház pɒlotájánɒk tɛtɛjén voltɒk ɒ mɛjɛkɛt ɒ júdɒ kirájɒi t͡ʃináltɒk éʃ ɒzokɒt ɒz oltárokɒt iʃ ɒ mɛjɛkɛt mɒnɒʃːɛ t͡ʃinált ɒz házánɒk pitvɒrábɒn lɛrontotːɒ ɒ kiráj éʃ lɛháɲván porukɒt ɒ kidron pɒtɒkjábɒ sórɒtːɒ okɒt ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒtokɒt iʃ mɛɡfɛrtõztɛtːɛ ɒ kiráj ɒ mɛjɛk jɛruʒálɛm ɛlõtː voltɒk ɒz olɒjfák hɛɟénɛk jobːfɛlõl lɛvõ oldɒlán ɒ mɛjɛkɛt méɡ ʃɒlɒmon ɒz izráɛl kirájɒ építɛtː ɒʃtórɛtnɛk ɒ ʃídonbɛliɛk útálɒtoʃːáɡánɒk éʃ kámóʃnɒk ɒ moábiták útálɒtoʃːáɡánɒk éʃ milkómnɒk ɒz ɒmːon fiɒi útálɒtoʃːáɡánɒk Éʃ ösːɛtörtɛ ɒz oslopokɒt éʃ kiváɡɒtːɒ ɒz ɒʃɛrákɒt éʃ ɒzok hɛjɛit ɛmbɛrt͡ʃontokːɒl töltötːɛ mɛɡ méɡ ɒzt ɒz iʃ ɒ mɛj béthɛlbɛn ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒtot ɒ mɛjɛt jɛroboám ɒ nébát fiɒ t͡ʃinált ɒ vétɛkbɛ ɛjté ɒz izráɛlt ɒzt ɒz iʃ éʃ ɒzt ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒtot iʃ lɛtörtɛ éʃ ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒtot fɛléɡɛtːɛ porːá tɛtːɛ éʃ ɒz ɒʃɛrát mɛɡéɡɛtːɛ Éʃ körültɛkintɛtː jóʃiáʃ éʃ mɛɡlátːɒ ɒ ʃírokɒt ɒ mɛjɛk otː ɒ hɛɟɛn voltɒk éʃ ɛlküldötː éʃ ɛlhozɒtːɒ ɒ t͡ʃontokɒt ɒ ʃírokból éʃ mɛɡéɡɛtːɛ ɒz éʃ mɛɡfɛrtõztɛtːɛ ɒzt ɒz bɛsédɛ sɛrint ɒ mɛjɛt mondotː ɒz iʃtɛn ɛmbɛrɛ ɒ ɛ dolɡot mɛɡjövɛndöltɛ mondɒ mifélɛ ʃírɛmlék ɛz ɒ mɛjɛt Éʃ fɛlɛlénɛk ɒ vároʃ férfiɒi ɒz iʃtɛn ɛmbɛrénɛk ʃírjɒ ɛz ɒ júdából jötː éʃ mindɛzɛkɛt mɛɡjövɛndöltɛ ɒ béthɛlbɛli fɛlõl ɒ mikɛt moʃt t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdtél Éʃ mondɒ hɒɟjɒtok éʃ ʃɛnki mɛɡ nɛ mozdítʃɒ ɒz tɛtɛmɛit Éʃ mɛɡmɛntɛtːék ɒz tɛtɛmɛit ɒnːɒk ɒ prófétánɒk ɒ tɛtɛmɛivɛl ɛɟütː ɒ ʃɒmɒriából jötː lɛrontotːɒ jóʃiáʃ ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒtok mindɛn iʃ ɒ mɛjɛk ʃɒmáriɒ vároʃɒibɒn voltɒk ɒ mɛjɛkɛt ɒz izráɛl kirájɒi t͡ʃináltɒk hoɟ ɒz urɒt hɒrɒɡrɒ inɡɛrɛljék éʃ épɛn úɟ t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdɛtː ɒzokːɒl mindɛnɛkbɛn ɒ béthɛlbɛn t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdɛtː Éʃ mɛɡáldoztɒ ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒtok ösːɛʃ pɒpjɒit ɒ otː voltɒk ɒz éʃ ɛmbɛri t͡ʃontokɒt éɡɛtɛtː mɛɡ ɒzokon éʃ úɟ visːɒ jɛruʒálɛmbɛ Éʃ pɒrɒnt͡ʃolt ɒ kiráj ɒz ɛɡés népnɛk éʃ mondɒ Ünːɛpɛljɛtɛk páʃkhát ɒz Úrnɒk ɒ iʃtɛntɛknɛk ɒ mɛɡ vɒn írvɒ ɛ sövɛtʃéɡ köɲvébɛn mɛrt nɛm sɛrɛztɛtɛtː ojɒn páʃkhɒ ɒ idɛjétõl foɡvɒ ɒ ɒz izráɛlt ʃɛm pɛdiɡ ɒz izráɛl éʃ ɒ júdɒ kirájɒinɒk mindɛn idɛjébɛn hɒnɛm t͡ʃɒk jóʃiáʃ kiráj tizɛɲːolt͡szɒdik ɛstɛndɛjébɛn sɛrɛztɛtɛtː ijɛn páʃkhɒ ɒz Úrnɒk jɛruʒálɛmbɛn Éʃ kivɛstɛtːɛ jóʃiáʃ kiráj ɒz ördönɡöʃökɛt éʃ ɒ titokfɛjtõkɛt ɒ tɛráfokɒt éʃ ɒ bálváɲokɒt éʃ mindɒzokɒt ɒz útálɒtoʃːáɡokɒt ɒ mɛjɛk látːɒtːɒk júdɒ éʃ jɛruʒálɛmbɛn hoɟ hɛjrɛálːítʃɒ ɒ törvéɲ bɛsédit ɒ mɛjɛk mɛɡ vɒlánɒk írvɒ ɒ köɲvbɛn ɒ mɛjɛt hilkiɒ pɒp tɒlált mɛɡ ɒz házábɒn nɛm iʃ hozːá hɒʃonló kiráj ɛlõtːɛ ɒ úɟ mɛɡtért volnɒ ɒz tɛljɛʃ sívébõl éʃ tɛljɛʃ lɛlkébõl éʃ tɛljɛʃ ɛrɛjébõl mózɛʃnɛk mindɛn törvéɲɛ sɛrint dɛ utánɒ ʃɛm támɒdotː hozːá hɒʃonló dɛ ɒz méɡ ʃɛm sünt mɛɡ ɒz mɛɡbúʃult nɒɟ hɒrɒɡjától ɒ mɛjjɛl mɛɡhɒrɒɡudotː júdárɒ mindɒzokért ɒ bosːɒntáʃokért ɒ mɛjɛkːɛl bosːɒntotːɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ mɛrt ɒzt ɒz júdát iʃ ɛlvɛtɛm sɛmɛm ɛlõl ɒ hoɟ ɒz izráɛlt ɛlvɛtɛtːɛm éʃ mɛɡútálom ɛzt ɒ vároʃt ɒ mɛjɛt válɒstotːɒm jɛruʒálɛmɛt éʃ ɛzt ɒ házɒt iʃ ɒ mɛjrõl ɒzt mondotːɒm otː lɛɟɛn ɒz nɛvɛm jóʃiáʃnɒk ɛɟéb dolɡɒi pɛdiɡ éʃ mindɛn t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdɛtɛi vɒjːon nint͡ʃɛnɛké mɛɡírvɒ ɒ júdɒ kirájɒinɒk krónikɒköɲvébɛn ɒz idɛjébɛn jötː fɛl fɒrɒónékó ɒz éɟiptomi kiráj ɒʃːiriɒ kirájɒ ɛlːɛn ɒz ɛufrátɛʃ fojóvizɛ mɛlːé Éʃ jóʃiáʃ kiráj ɛlɛibɛ mɛnt dɛ ɒz mɛɡöltɛ mɛɡidːóbɒn ɒ mɛɡlátːɒ Éʃ ɒz solɡái sɛkérːɛ hɒlvɒ vitːék ɛl mɛɡidːóból éʃ jɛruʒálɛmbɛ ɛltɛmɛték ɒz ʃírboltjábɒ ɒ népɛ pɛdiɡ vɛvé joákházt ɒ jóʃiáʃ éʃ fɛlkɛnvén kirájjá tɛvé ɒz ɒcjɒ hɛjɛtː husonhárom ɛstɛndõʃ joákház urɒlkodni kɛzdɛtː éʃ hónɒpiɡ urɒlkodotː jɛruʒálɛmbɛn éʃ ɒz ɒɲjánɒk nɛvɛ hɒmutál ɒ libnɒbɛli jɛrɛmiáʃ lɛáɲɒ Éʃ ɡonosul t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdék ɒz sɛmɛi ɛlõtː ɒ sɛrint ɒ ɒz ɒcái t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdtɛk dɛ fɒrɒónékó bilint͡ʃɛkbɛ vɛrtɛ riblábɒn hámát ɒ jɛruʒálɛmbɛn kirájjá lɛtː éʃ ɒz orsáɡrɒ ɒdót vɛtɛtː sáz tálɛntom ɛzüʃtöt éʃ ɛɟ tálɛntom ɒrɒɲɒt Éʃ fɒrɒónékó ɛliákimot ɒ jóʃiáʃ tɛtːɛ kirájjá ɒz ɒcjɒ jóʃiáʃ hɛjɛtː éʃ nɛvét joákimrɒ változtɒtːɒ joákházt pɛdiɡ mɒɡávɒl éʃ ɒz Éɟiptombɒ mɛɡérkɛzvén otː hɒlɒ mɛɡ ɒz ɛzüʃtöt éʃ ɒz ɒrɒɲɒt mɛɡɒdtɒ uɟɒn joákim ɒ fɒrɒónɒk dɛ ɒz orsáɡot ʃɒrt͡szoltɒtːɒ mɛɡ hoɟ mɛɡɒdhɒʃːɒ ɒz ɛzüʃtöt ɒ fɒrɒó pɒrɒnt͡ʃolɒtɒ sɛrint ɒ népɛ mindɛnkitõl ɒz értékɛ sɛrint hɒjtotː bɛ ɛzüʃtöt éʃ ɒrɒɲɒt hoɟ fɒrɒónékónɒk ɒdjɒ joákim husonöt ɛstɛndõʃ urɒlkodni kɛzdɛtː éʃ tizɛnɛɟ ɛstɛndɛiɡ urɒlkodotː jɛruʒálɛmbɛn ɒz ɒɲjánɒk nɛvɛ zébudɒ ɒ rúmɒbɛli pɛdájɒ lɛáɲɒ Éʃ ɡonosul t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdék ɒz sɛmɛi ɛlõtː ɒ sɛrint ɒ ɒz ɒcái t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdtɛk idɛjébɛn jötː fɛl nɒbukodonozor bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ éʃ joákim solɡájɒ lɛtː ɛstɛndɛiɡ dɛ ɒzután ɛlfordult éʃ ɛlpártolt tõlɛ Éʃ ɒz ɒ káldɛuʃok ʃɛrɛɡɛit ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk ʃɛrɛɡɛit ɒ moábiták ʃɛrɛɡɛit éʃ ɒz ɒmːon fiɒinɒk ʃɛrɛɡɛit éʃ ráküldtɛ õkɛt júdárɒ hoɟ ɛlvɛsɛʃːék ɒz bɛsédɛ sɛrint ɒ mɛjɛt sólotː solɡái ɒ áltɒl t͡ʃɒk ɒz bɛsédɛ sɛrint ɛz júdán hoɟ ɛlvɛʃːɛ ɒ mɒɡɒ ort͡szájɒ ɛlõl mɒnɒʃːɛ bûnɛiért ɒ sɛrint ɒ t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdɛtː vɒlɒ Éʃ ɒz ártɒtlɒn iʃ ɒ mɛjɛt kiontotː éʃ hoɟ bɛtöltötːɛ jɛruʒálɛmɛt ártɒtlɒn vérːɛl ɛzért nɛm ɒkɒrt ɒz mɛɡbot͡ʃátɒni joákimnɒk ɛɟéb dolɡɒi pɛdiɡ éʃ mindɛn t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdɛtɛi vɒjːon nint͡ʃɛnɛké mɛɡírvɒ ɒ júdɒ kirájɒinɒk krónikɒköɲvébɛn Éʃ ɛlɒluvék joákim ɒz ɒcáivɒl éʃ ɒz fiɒ joákin urɒlkodék hɛjɛtːɛ Éʃ Éɟiptom kirájɒ töbːé nɛm jötː ɒz mɛrt bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ mindɛnt ɛlvɛtː ɒ t͡ʃɒk ɒz éɟiptomi kirájé Éɟiptom fojóvizétõl ɒz ɛufrátɛʃ fojóvizéiɡ tizɛɲːolt͡sz ɛstɛndõʃ joákin kirájjá lɛtː éʃ hónɒpiɡ urɒlkodotː jɛruʒálɛmbɛn ɒz ɒɲjánɒk nɛvɛ nékhuʃtɒ ɒ jɛruʒálɛmbɛli ɛlnɒtán lɛáɲɒ Éʃ ɡonosul t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdék ɒz sɛmɛi ɛlõtː ɒ sɛrint ɒ ɒz ɒcjɒ t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdɛtː ɛbːɛn ɒz idõbɛn jötːɛk fɛl nɒbukodonozornɒk bɒbilóniɒ kirájánɒk solɡái jɛruʒálɛm ɛlːɛn éʃ sálːotːák mɛɡ ɒ vároʃt ɒɡɒ nɒbukodonozor bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ iʃ fɛljötː ɒ vároʃ ɛlːɛn ɒ mɛjɛt ɒz solɡái mɛɡsálːotːɒk Éʃ kimɛnt joákin ɒ júdɒ kirájɒ bɒbilóniɒ kirájához ɒz ɒɲjávɒl solɡáivɒl hɒdnɒɟɒivɒl éʃ udvɒrisolɡáivɒl ɛɟütː dɛ foɡʃáɡrɒ vɛtɛtːɛ bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ ɒz urɒlkodáʃánɒk ɲolt͡szɒdik ɛstɛndɛjébɛn Éʃ ɛlvitːɛ onːét ɒz házánɒk mindɛn kint͡ʃét éʃ ɒ kiráj házánɒk kint͡ʃét éʃ ösːɛvɒɡdɒlt mindɛn ɒrɒɲ ɛdéɲt ɒ mɛjɛt ʃɒlɒmon ɒz izráɛl kirájɒ t͡ʃináltɒtotː ɒz tɛmplomábɒn ɒ ɒz mɛɡmondotːɒ ɛlhurt͡szoltɒ ɒz ɛɡés jɛruʒálɛmɛt ösːɛʃ fɛjɛdɛlmɛit éʃ mindɛn vitézɛit tízɛzɛr foɡjot ɒz ösːɛʃ mɛʃtɛrɛmbɛrɛkɛt éʃ lɒkɒtoʃokɒt úɟ hoɟ ɒ sɛɡéɲ ʃɛnki ʃɛm mɒrɒdt otː Éʃ ɛlhurt͡szoltɒ joákint iʃ bɒbilóniábɒ éʃ ɒ kiráj ɒɲját éʃ ɒ kiráj fɛlɛʃéɡɛit éʃ udvɒrisolɡáit éʃ ɒz orsáɡ ɛrõʃ vitézɛit foɡʃáɡbɒ hurt͡szoltɒ jɛruʒálɛmbõl bɒbilóniábɒ Éʃ ɒz ösːɛʃ ɛlõkɛlõ férfiɒkɒt hétɛzɛrɛt éʃ ɒ mɛʃtɛrɛmbɛrɛkɛt éʃ ɒ lɒkɒtoʃokɒt ɛzɛrɛt éʃ ɒz ösːɛʃ ɛrõʃ hɒrt͡szrɒ tɛrmɛtː férfiɒkɒt foɡvɒ vitːɛ bɒbilóniábɒ bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ Éʃ bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ mɒtːɒniát nɒɟbácját tɛtːɛ hɛjɛtːɛ kirájjá éʃ nɛvét ʃédékiáʃrɒ változtɒtːɒ husonɛɟ ɛstɛndõʃ ʃédékiáʃ urɒlkodni kɛzdɛtː éʃ tizɛnɛɟ ɛstɛndɛiɡ urɒlkodotː jɛruʒálɛmbɛn ɒz ɒɲjánɒk nɛvɛ hɒmutál ɒ libnából vɒló jɛrɛmiáʃ lɛáɲɒ Éʃ ɡonosul t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdék ɒz sɛmɛi ɛlõtː ɒ sɛrint ɒ joákim t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdɛtː mɛrt ɒz hɒrɒɡjɒ miɒtː ɛz íɟ jɛruʒálɛmːɛl éʃ júdávɒl míɡ t͡ʃɒk ɛl nɛm vɛtɛtːɛ õkɛt ɒz ort͡szájɒ ɛlõl ʃédékiáʃ ɒzonbɒn ɛlpártolt bɒbilóniɒ kirájától Éʃ ɒz urɒlkodáʃánɒk kilɛnt͡szɛdik ɛstɛndɛjébɛn ɒ tizɛdik hónɒpbɒn éʃ ɒnːɒk tizɛdik nɒpján hoɟ fɛljötː nɒbukodonozor bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ mindɛn ʃɛrɛɡévɛl jɛruʒálɛm ɛlːɛn éʃ táborbɒ sálːotː ɛlːɛnɛ éʃ köröʃkörül oʃtromtorɲokɒt építɛtːɛk ɛlːɛnɛ Éʃ mɛɡsálːvɒ tɒrtɒtotː ɒ vároʃ ʃédékiáʃ kiráj tizɛnɛɟɛdik ɛstɛndɛjéiɡ ɒ nɛɟɛdik hónɒp kilɛnt͡szɛdik nɒpján ɒkːorɒ inʃéɡ lɛtː ɒ vároʃbɒn hoɟ nɛm ɛnːi ɒ népénɛk bɛtörɛtɛtː ɒ vároʃ éʃ ɒ hɒrt͡szoʃok kɛzdtɛk éjːɛl ɒ kɛtːõʃ kõfɒl közötː lɛvõ kɒpu ɒ mɛj ɒ kiráj kɛrtjɛ mɛlːɛtː vɒn ɒ káldɛuʃok pɛdiɡ otː táboroztɒk ɒ vároʃ Éʃ ɒ kiráj iʃ ɛlfutotː ɒ pustɒ dɛ ɒ káldɛuʃok hɒdɒ ûzõbɛ vɛtːɛ ɒ kirájt éʃ jɛrikhó mɛzɛjén éʃ ɛɡés ʃɛrɛɡɛ sétsóródotː mɛlːõlɛ Éʃ ɛlfoɡták ɒ kirájt éʃ ɛlvitːék bɒbilóniɒ kirájához riblábɒ ɒ ítélɛtɛt tɒrtotːɒk fölötːɛ Éʃ ʃédékiáʃ fiɒit ʃɒját sɛmɛ látːárɒ váɡták lɛ ʃédékiáʃ sɛmɛit pɛdiɡ mɛɡvɒkítotːák éʃ lánt͡szokbɒ vɛrvɛ vitːék ɛl bɒbilóniábɒ Éʃ ɒz hónɒp hɛtɛdik nɒpján ɛz ɒ nɒbukodonozor bɒbilóniɒi kiráj urɒlkodáʃánɒk tizɛnkilɛnt͡szɛdik ɛstɛndɛjɛ fɛljötː nɒbuzárɒdán ɒ vitézɛk hɒdnɒɟɒ bɒbilóniɒ kirájánɒk solɡájɒ jɛruʒálɛmbɛ Éʃ fɛlɟújtotːɒ ɒz éʃ ɒ kiráj éʃ jɛruʒálɛm ösːɛʃ házɒit éʃ ɒ nɒɟ pɒlotákɒt fɛléɡɛtːɛ tûzːɛl Éʃ jɛruʒálɛm kõfɒlɒit köröʃkörül lɛromboltɒ ɒ káldɛuʃok ʃɛrɛɡɛ ɒ mɛj ɒ vitézɛk hɒdnɒɟávɒl ɒ töbːi népɛt pɛdiɡ ɒ mɛj ɒ vároʃbɒn méɡ mɛɡmɒrɒdt éʃ ɒzokɒt ɒ bɒbilóniɒ kirájához hɒjlotːɒk éʃ ɒ töbːi népɛt ɛlhurt͡szoltɒ nɒbuzárɒdán ɒ vitézɛk hɒdnɒɟɒ ɒ népénɛk t͡ʃɒk ɒ sɛɡéɲébõl hɒɟotː otː ɒ vitézɛk hɒdnɒɟɒ sõlõmívɛʃɛkɛt éʃ sántóvɛtõ ɛmbɛrɛkɛt ɒ rézoslopokɒt ɒ mɛjɛk ɒz házábɒn voltɒk éʃ ɒ moʃdómɛdɛnt͡szék tɒlpɒit éʃ ɒ réztɛnɡɛrt ɒ mɛj ɒz házábɒn ösːɛtörték ɒ káldɛuʃok éʃ ɒzok rɛzét bɒbilóniábɒ vitːék ɛlvitːék ɒ fɒzɛkɒkɒt iʃ ɒ lɒpátokɒt ɒ kéʃɛkɛt tɛmjénɛzõkɛt éʃ mindɛn solɡálɒtrɒ rɛndɛlt ɛɟéb rézɛdéɲɛkɛt Éʃ ɛlvitːɛ ɒ vitézɛk hɒdnɒɟɒ ɒ ʃɛrpɛɲõkɛt ɒ mɛdɛnt͡székɛt ɒ mɛjɛk némɛjɛk ɒrɒɲból némɛjɛk pɛdiɡ ɛzüʃtbõl voltɒk rézoslopot ɒ réztɛnɡɛrt éʃ ɒ moʃdómɛdɛnt͡szék tɒlpɒit ɒ mɛjɛkɛt ʃɒlɒmon t͡ʃinált ɒz házábɒn mɛɡmérhɛtɛtlɛn mindɛzɛknɛk ɒz ɛdéɲɛknɛk ɒ rɛzɛ ɒz ɛɟik oslop mɒɡɒʃːáɡɒ tizɛɲːolt͡sz ʃinɡ éʃ ɛɟ rézɡömb rɒjtɒ éʃ ɒ ɡömb ʃinɡ mɒɡɒʃ ɒ ɡömbön köröʃkörül hálózɒt éʃ ɡránátɒlmák ért͡szbõl éʃ uɟɒnijɛn ɒ máʃik oslop iʃ ɒ hálózɒtːɒl ɛɟütː Éʃ ɛlhurt͡szoltɒ ɒ vitézɛk hɒdnɒɟɒ ʃɛrájɒ pɒpot iʃ ɒz ɛlʃõ rɛndbõl éʃ ʃofóniáʃ pɒpot ɒ máʃodik rɛndbõl éʃ ɒ ɒjtónálːót Éʃ ɒ vároʃból ɛlvitː ɛɟ fõɛmbɛrt ɒ hɒdɒkozó férfiɒk ɛlõljáró hɒdnɒɟɒ éʃ ɒ ɒ kiráj forɡolódtɒk ɒ tɒláltɒtːɒk ɒ vároʃbɒn éʃ ɒ ʃɛrɛɡ hɒdnɒɟánɒk íródɛákját ɒ ʃɛrɛɡɛt ɟûjt vɒlɒ ɒ népɛ éʃ hɒtvɒn férfiɒkɒt ɒ népɛ ɒ otː tɒláltɒtːɒk ɒ vároʃbɒn Éʃ vɛvé õkɛt nɒbuzárɒdán ɒ vitézɛk hɒdnɒɟɒ éʃ ɛlvitːɛ bɒbilóniɒ kirájához riblábɒ lɛváɡtɒ õkɛt bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ éʃ mɛɡöltɛ riblábɒn ɒ hámát Éʃ íɟ vitɛték ɛl júdɒ ɒz ɒ júdɒ mɛɡmɒrɒdt népnɛk pɛdiɡ ɒ mɛjɛt mɛɡhɒɟotː nɒbukodonozor bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ ɡɛdáliát ɒhikámnɒk ɒ ʃáfán fiánɒk rɛndɛltɛ tistːɒrtóul mikor pɛdiɡ mɛɡhɒlːotːák ɒ ʃɛrɛɡɛk hɒdnɒɟɒi éʃ ɒz ɛmbɛrɛik hoɟ bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ ɡɛdáliát tɛtːɛ tistːɒrtóvá ɛlmɛntɛk ɡɛdáliához miʃpábɒ izmáɛl ɒ nétániɒ fiɒ éʃ johɒnán ɒ kɒrɛáh fiɒ éʃ ʃɛrájɒ ɒ tánhumɛt fiɒ éʃ jɒhɒzániɒ mɒɒkáti fiɒ éʃ ɒz ɛmbɛrɛik Éʃ mɛɡɛʃküdötː ɡɛdáliɒ éʃ ɒz ɛmbɛrɛiknɛk éʃ mondɒ nɛ féljɛtɛk ɒ káldɛuʃoknɒk vɒló solɡálɒtːól mɒrɒdjɒtok ɒz orsáɡbɒn éʃ solɡáljɒtok bɒbilóniɒ kirájánɒk éʃ dolɡotok lɛs ɒ hɛtɛdik hónɒpbɒn ɒzonbɒn ɛlmɛnt izmáɛl nétániánɒk ɒz ɛliʃámɒ fiánɒk fiɒ ɒ kiráji mɒɡból éʃ vɛlɛ éʃ mɛɡölték ɡɛdáliát éʃ mɛɡhɒlt éʃ ɒ ʒidókɒt éʃ ɒ káldɛuʃokɒt ɒ vɛlɛ voltɒk miʃpábɒn Éʃ fɛlkɛlt ɒz ɛɡés kit͡ʃiɲtõl nɒɟiɡ éʃ ɒ ʃɛrɛɡɛk hɒdnɒɟɒi éʃ ɛlmɛntɛk Éɟiptombɒ mɛrt féltɛk ɒ káldɛuʃoktól Éʃ ɒ hɒrmint͡szhɛtɛdik ɛstɛndõbɛn joákinːɒk ɒ júdɒ kirájánɒk foɡʃáɡbɒ hurt͡szoltɒtáʃɒ ɒ tizɛnkɛtːɛdik hónɒp husonhɛtɛdik nɒpján kivɛtːɛ ɛvilmɛrodák bɒbilóniɒ kirájɒ ɒz urɒlkodáʃánɒk ɛlʃõ ɛstɛndɛjébɛn joákint júdɒ kiráját ɒ foɡházból Éʃ kɛɟɛʃɛn bɛsélt vɛlɛ éʃ fɛljɛbː tɛtːɛ ɒz sékét ɒ töbːi kirájok sékɛinél ɒ nálɒ voltɒk bɒbilóniábɒn Éʃ kit͡ʃɛréltɛ foɡʃáɡɒ éʃ mindɛnkor nálɒ étɛlɛ élɛténɛk mindɛn idɛjébɛn Éʃ mindɛnkor ɒz résɛ ɒ mɛjɛt ɒ kiráj ɒdotː nɒpról nɒprɒ élɛténɛk mindɛn idɛjébɛn ʃéth Énóʃ kénán mɒhɒlálél járɛd mɛthuʃéláh lámɛkh noé ʃém khám éʃ jáfɛt jáfɛtnɛk fiɒi ɡómɛr máɡoɡ mɒdɒi jáván thubál méʃɛkh éʃ thirás ɒ ɡómɛr fiɒi pɛdiɡ ɒʃkhɛnáz rifáth éʃ tóɡármɒh jávánːɒk pɛdiɡ fiɒi ɛliʃɒh thárʃiʃ kitːhim éʃ dodánim khámnɒk fiɒi khúʃ mit͡szráim pút éʃ kɒnɒán khúʃnɒk fiɒi sébɒ hávilɒh sábthɒh rɒhmáh éʃ sɒbthékɒh rɒhmáhnɒk pɛdiɡ fiɒi ʃébɒ éʃ dédán khúʃ nɛmzé nimródot iʃ ɛz kɛzdɛ hɒtɒlmɒʃːá lɛnːi ɒ mit͡szráim pɛdiɡ nɛmzé lúdimot ɒnámimot lɛhábimot éʃ nɒftukhimot pɒthrusimot éʃ kɒslukhimot ɒ ɒ filistɛuʃok sármɒztɒk éʃ kɒfthorimot kɒnɒán pɛdiɡ nɛmzé t͡szídont ɒz ɛlʃõsülötːét éʃ khétɛt Éʃ jɛbuzɛuʃt ɛmorːɛuʃt éʃ ɡirɡɒzɛuʃt khivːɛuʃt hɒrkɛuʃt éʃ sinɛuʃt ɒrvɒdɛuʃt t͡szɛmɒrɛuʃt éʃ hɒmɒthɛuʃt ʃémnɛk fiɒi éʃ ɒʃːur ɒrpɒkʃád lúd ɒrám Út͡sz húl ɡɛthɛr éʃ mɛʃɛk ɒrpɒkʃád pɛdiɡ nɛmzé ʃéláht éʃ ʃéláh nɛmzé hébɛrt hébɛrnɛk iʃ lɛtː fiɒ ɒz ɛɟiknɛk nɛvɛ pélɛɡ mivɛlhoɟ ɒz idɛjébɛn ostɒtotː ɛl ɒ tɛʃtvérénɛk nɛvɛ pɛdiɡ joktán joktán pɛdiɡ nɛmzé ɒlmodádot éʃ ʃélɛfɛt hɒt͡szɒrmávɛthɛt éʃ jɛrákhot hɒdórámot éʃ diklát Éʃ ɛbált ɒbimáɛlt éʃ ʃébát ofirt hɒvilát éʃ jóbábot ɛzɛk joktán fiɒi ʃém ɒrpɒkʃád ʃéláh hébɛr pélɛɡ réu ʃéruɡ nákhor tháré ɒbrám ɛz ɒz Ábrɒhám Ábrɒhám fiɒi iʒák éʃ iʃmáɛl ɛzɛknɛk nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛi pɛdiɡ ɛzɛk iʃmáɛl ɛlʃõsülötːɛ nɛbájót éʃ kédɒr ɒdbɛél éʃ mibsám miʃmɒ éʃ dúmɒh mɒsːɒ hɒdɒd éʃ thémɒ jétur náfiʃ éʃ kɛdmɒh ɛzɛk ɒz iʃmáɛl fiɒi kɛturánɒk pɛdiɡ ɒz Ábrɒhám áɟɒʃánɒk fiɒi kikɛt sülɛ ɛzɛk zimrán jokʃán médán midián iʃbák éʃ ʃuɒkh Éʃ ɒ jokʃán fiɒi ʃébɒ éʃ dédán Éʃ ɒ midián fiɒi Éfɒh héfɛr hánok ɒbidɒ éʃ ɛldáh mindɛzɛk ɒ kɛturáh fiɒi Ábrɒhám pɛdiɡ nɛmzé iʒákot iʒák fiɒi pɛdiɡ ɛzɛk Éʒɒu éʃ izráɛl Éʒɒunɒk fiɒi ɛlifáz réhuél jéhuʃ jɒhlám éʃ korɒkh ɛlifáz fiɒi thémán omár t͡szɛfi ɡɒhtám kɛnáz éʃ timnɒ éʃ ɒmálɛk réhuél fiɒi nɒkhɒth zérɒkh ʃɒmːɒ éʃ mizːɒ séir fiɒi lótán éʃ ʃóbál t͡szibhón hɒná diʃón ɛt͡szɛr éʃ diʃán lótán fiɒi pɛdiɡ hóri éʃ hómám lótánːɒk huɡɒ pɛdiɡ timnɒ ʃóbál fiɒi ɒlján éʃ mánɒkháth hébál ʃɛfi éʃ onám t͡szibhón fiɒi pɛdiɡ ɒjɒ éʃ hɒná hɒná fiɒ diʃón diʃón fiɒi pɛdiɡ hɒmrán éʃ ɛʃbán ithrán éʃ khɛrán ɛt͡szɛr fiɒi bilhán éʃ zɒhɒván jɒkán diʃán fiɒi hút͡sz éʃ ɒrán ɛzɛk pɛdiɡ ɒ kirájok ɒ urɒlkodánɒk ɛdom miɛlõtː ɒz izráɛl fiɒi közötː kiráj urɒlkodotː volnɒ bɛlɒ bɛhor fiɒ ɒz vároʃánɒk nɛvɛ dinhábɒ vɒlɒ ɛlɒ mɛɡhɒlván urɒlkodék hɛjɛtːɛ jóbáb ɒ bot͡szrából vɒló zɛrɒkh fiɒ Éʃ hoɟ jóbáb mɛɡhɒlɒ urɒlkodék hɛjɛtːɛ ɒ témán vɒló khuʃám mɛɡhɒlɒ khuʃám iʃ éʃ urɒlkodék hɛjɛtːɛ hɒdád ɒ bédád fiɒ mɛɡvɛré ɒ midiánitákɒt ɒ moáb mɛzɛjén éʃ ɒz vároʃánɒk nɛvɛ hávit vɒlɒ hɒdád iʃ hoɟ mɛɡhɒlɒ urɒlkodék hɛjɛtːɛ ɒ mɒʃrɛkából vɒló sɒmlá sɒmlá holtɒ urɒlkodék hɛjɛtːɛ ʃɒul ɒ fojóvíz mɛlːɛtː vɒló rékhobóthból ʃɒul iʃ mɛɡhɒlɒ éʃ urɒlkodék hɛjɛtːɛ báhálkhɒnán ɒz ɒkhbór fiɒ báhálkhɒnán holtɒ urɒlkodék hɛjɛtːɛ hɒdád éʃ ɒz vároʃánɒk nɛvɛ páhi fɛlɛʃéɡénɛk pɛdiɡ nɛvɛ mɛhɛtábéɛl mézɒháb lɛáɲánɒk mɒtrédnɒk ɒ lɛáɲɒ hɒdád hɒlálɒ ɛdom fɛjɛdɛlmɛi vɒlánɒk timná fɛjɛdɛlɛm hɒlvá fɛjɛdɛlɛm jɛtéth fɛjɛdɛlɛm ohólibámá fɛjɛdɛlɛm Élɒ fɛjɛdɛlɛm éʃ pinon fɛjɛdɛlɛm kɛnáz fɛjɛdɛlɛm témán fɛjɛdɛlɛm éʃ mibt͡szár fɛjɛdɛlɛm mɒɡdiél fɛjɛdɛlɛm éʃ hirám fɛjɛdɛlɛm ɛzɛk voltɒk ɛdom fɛjɛdɛlmɛi ɛzɛk ɒz izráɛl fiɒi rúbɛn ʃimɛon lévi júdɒ iʃːɒkhár éʃ zɛbulon dán jóʒɛf bɛnjámin nɒfthɒli ɡád éʃ Áʃɛr dánɒk fiɒi hér éʃ ʃélɒ ɛ sülɛték ɒ kɒnɒánitɒ ʃúɒhnɒk lɛáɲától dɛ hér júdánɒk ɛlʃõsülötː fiɒ ɡonos vɒlɒ ɒz sɛmɛi ɛlõtː éʃ mɛɡölé ɒz pɛdiɡ ɒz mɛɲɛ sülé pérɛt͡szɛt éʃ zɛrákhot júdánɒk fiɒi mindɲájɒn ötɛn vɒlánɒk pérɛt͡sz fiɒi khɛt͡szrón éʃ khámul zɛrákh fiɒi pɛdiɡ zimri éʃ ɛthán hémán kálkól éʃ dárɒ mindɛnɛʃtõl ötɛn kármi fiɒi izráɛlnɛk mɛɡrontójɒ mivɛl lopotː ɒ ʒákmáɲból ɛthán fiɒ ɒzáriɒ khɛt͡szrón fiɒi sülɛtːɛnɛk jérɒkhméɛl rám éʃ kélubɒi rám nɛmzé ɒmːinádábot ɒmːinádáb pɛdiɡ nɛmzé nɒkhʃont ɒ júdɒ fiɒinɒk fɛjɛdɛlmét nɒkhʃon nɛmzé sálmát sálmɒ pɛdiɡ nɛmzé boázt boáz nɛmzé obɛdɛt obɛd nɛmzé iʃɒit iʃɒi pɛdiɡ nɛmzé ɛliábot ɒz ɛlʃõsülötːét éʃ ɒbinádábot máʃodikɒt ʃimɛát hɒrmɒdikɒt nɛtɒnéɛlt nɛɟɛdikɛt éʃ rɒdːɒit ötödikɛt oʃɛmɛt hɒtodikɒt éʃ dávidot ɒ hɛtɛdik Éʃ nõvérɛikɛt ʃéruját éʃ ɒbiɡáilt ʃérujánɒk pɛdiɡ fiɒi voltɒk ɒbʃɒi joáb éʃ ɒʃáɛl ɛ ɒbiɡáil sülé ɒmɒʃát ɒmɒʃánɒk ɒcjɒ pɛdiɡ ɒz iʃmáɛl nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl vɒló jétɛr vɒlɒ kálɛb pɛdiɡ ɒ khɛt͡szrón fiɒ nɛmzɛtː vɒlɒ ɒz ɒzubɒ nɛvû fɛlɛʃéɡétõl éʃ jériótːól éʃ ɛzɛk ɒz fiɒi jéʃɛr ʃobáb éʃ ɒrdon ɒzubɒ mɛɡhɒlɒ éʃ kálɛb vɛvé mɒɡánɒk fɛlɛʃéɡül ɛfrɒtát éʃ ɛz sülé húrt húr nɛmzé urit uri pɛdiɡ nɛmzé béʃɒléɛlt ɒzután bɛménɛ khɛt͡szrón mákirnɒk ɡilɛád ɒcjánɒk lɛáɲához mɛrt ɛzt ɛlvɛtːɛ vɒlɒ hɒtvɒn ɛstɛndõʃ korábɒn éʃ sülé ʃéɡubot ʃéɡub pɛdiɡ nɛmzé jáirt kinɛk husonhárom vároʃɒ vɒlɒ ɒ ɡilɛád dɛ ɡɛʃur éʃ ɛlvɛtːék jáir fɒlvɒit kɛnáthot éʃ mɛzõvároʃɒit hɒtvɒn vároʃt mindɛzɛk mákirnɒk ɒ ɡilɛád ɒcjánɒk fiɒié minɛkutánɒ pɛdiɡ mɛɡhɒlɒ khɛt͡szrón kálɛbɛfrɒtábɒn ɒkːor sülé ɒbijɒ ɒ khɛt͡szrón fɛlɛʃéɡɛ ɒʃhúrt tékoɒ ɒcját jérɒkhméɛlnɛk ɒ khɛt͡szrón ɛlʃõsülötːénɛk fiɒi voltɒk rám ɒz ɛlʃõsülötː búnɒ orɛm oʃɛm éʃ ɒkhijɒ volt máʃ fɛlɛʃéɡɛ iʃ jérɒkhméɛlnɛk ɒtárɒ nɛvû ɛz ɒz onám ɒɲjɒ rámnɒk jérɒkhméɛl ɛlʃõsülötːénɛk pɛdiɡ fiɒi voltɒk mɒáʃ jámin éʃ hékɛr onám fiɒi voltɒk ʃɒmːɒi éʃ jádɒ éʃ ʃɒmːɒi fiɒi nádáb éʃ ɒbiʃúr ɒbiʃúr fɛlɛʃéɡénɛk nɛvɛ ɒbihɒil ɒ sülé ɒkhbánt éʃ mólidot nádáb fiɒi sélɛd éʃ ɒpːɒim sélɛd mɒɡtɒlɒnul hɒlt mɛɡ ɒpːɒim fiɒ iʃi iʃi fiɒ ʃéʃán ʃéʃán fiɒ ɒhálɒi jádɒ fiɒi ɒ ʃɒmːɒi tɛʃtvérɛ jétɛr éʃ jonɒthán jétɛr mɒɡtɒlɒnul hɒlt mɛɡ jonɒthán fiɒi pélɛt éʃ zázɒ ɛzɛk voltɒk ɒ jérɒkhméɛl fiɒi ʃéʃánːɒk nɛm voltɒk fiɒi hɒnɛm t͡ʃɒk lɛáɲɒi dɛ ʃéʃánːɒk ɛɟ Éɟiptombɛli solɡájɒ járhɒ nɛvû Éʃ ɒdá ʃéʃán ɛ járhɒ nɛvû solɡájánɒk ɒz lɛáɲát fɛlɛʃéɡül ɒ sülé ɒthɒit ɒthɒi pɛdiɡ nɛmzé nátánt nátán nɛmzé zɒbádot zɒbád nɛmzé ɛflált ɛflál nɛmzé obɛdɛt obɛd nɛmzé jéhut jéhu nɛmzé ɒzáriát ɒzáriɒ nɛmzé hélɛʃt hélɛʃ nɛmzé ɛláʃát ɛláʃɒ nɛmzé ʃiʃémɒit ʃiʃémɒi nɛmzé ʃɒlːumot ʃɒlːum nɛmzé jékámiát jékámiɒ pɛdiɡ nɛmzé ɛliʃámát ɒ kálɛb fiɒi pɛdiɡ ɒ jérɒkhméɛl tɛʃtvérɛ vɒlɒ ɛlʃõsülötːɛ méʃɒ ɛz zifnɛk éʃ mɒréʃɒ fiɒinɒk ɒcjok hɛbronːɒk ɒcjɒ hɛbron fiɒi kórɒh tɒpːuɒh rékɛm éʃ ʃémɒ ʃémɒ pɛdiɡ nɛmzé rɒhámot ɒ jorkɛám ɒcját éʃ rékɛm nɛmzé ʃɒmːɒit ʃɒmːɒi fiɒ pɛdiɡ máon ɛz ɒ máon ɒ bɛthʃúr ɒcjɒ ɛfɒ pɛdiɡ ɒ kálɛb áɟɒʃtárʃɒ sülé háránt éʃ móʃát éʃ ɡázɛzt éʃ hárán nɛmzé ɡázɛzt jɒdːɒi fiɒi pɛdiɡ réɡɛm jotám ɡéʃán pɛlɛt héfɒ éʃ ʃɒáf ɒ kálɛb áɟɒʃɒ mɒɒkɒ sülé ʃébɛrt éʃ tirhánát Éʃ sülé ʃɒáfot mɒdmɒnːɒ ɒcját ʃɛvát ɒ mɒkbénɒ ɒcját éʃ ɡibɛɒ ɒcját éʃ ɒksɒ ɒ kálɛb lɛáɲɒ vɒlɒ ɛzɛk voltɒk kálɛb fiɒi ɒ húrnɒk ɒz ɛfrɒtɒ ɛlʃõsülötːénɛk fiɒ ʃobál kirjátjɛárim ɒcjɒ sálmɒ bɛthlɛhɛm ɒcjɒ hárɛf bɛthɡádɛr ɒcjɒ ltɒk pɛdiɡ ʃobálnɒk iʃ ɒ kirjátjɛárim ɒcjánɒk fiɒi hɒroé ɒ mɛnuhót urɒ ɒ kirjátjɛárim háznépɛi jitrɛuʃok putɛuʃok ʃumɒtɛuʃok miʃrɒitɛuʃok ɛzɛktõl sármɒzánɒk ɒ ʃorɒtɛuʃok éʃ ɒz ɛʃtɒolitɛuʃok sálmɒ fiɒi bɛthlɛhɛm éʃ ɒ nɛtofátbɛliɛk ɒtróth bɛthjoáb ɒ t͡szórɒbɛli mɒnɒhɒtɛuʃok fɛlɛ Éʃ ɒ jábɛʃbɛn lɒkozó tudóʃ ɛmbɛrɛk háznépɛi ɒ tirɒtɛuʃok ʃimɒtɛuʃok ʃukɒtɛuʃok ɛzɛk ɒ kinɛuʃok ɒ hámátːól ɒ rékáb házánɒk ɒcjától sármɒztɒk ɛzɛk ɒ dávid fiɒi ɒ hɛbronbɒn sülɛténɛk ɛlʃõsülötːɛ vɒlɒ ɒmnon ɒ jɛzréɛlbõl vɒló ɒhinoámtól máʃodik vɒlɒ dániɛl ɒ kármɛlbõl vɒló ɒbiɡɒiltól hɒrmɒdik ɒbʃolon ɒ mɒɒkánɒk ɒ ɡɛʃːurbɛli tɒlmɒi kiráj lɛáɲánɒk ɒ fiɒ nɛɟɛdik ɒdóniɒ hɒɡːitːól vɒló ʃɛfátiɒ ɒbitáltól vɒló hɒtodik jitrɛám ɒz fɛlɛʃéɡétõl ɛɡlától vɒló hɒt fiɒ sülɛték hɛbronbɒn ɒ ɛstɛndɛiɡ éʃ hɒt hónɒpiɡ urɒlkodotː jɛruʒálɛmbɛn pɛdiɡ hɒrmint͡szhárom ɛstɛndɛiɡ urɒlkodék jɛruʒálɛmbɛn pɛdiɡ ɛzɛk sülɛténɛk ʃimɛɒ ʃóbáb nátán éʃ ʃɒlɒmon néɟɛn bɒthʃuától ɒz ɒmːiɛl lɛáɲától Éʃ ibhár ɛliʃámɒ éʃ ɛlifélɛt nóɡɒh néfɛɡ éʃ jáfiɒ Éʃ ɛliʃámɒ ɛljɒdɒ éʃ ɛlifélɛt kilɛnt͡szɛn mindɛzɛk ɒ dávid fiɒi ɒz áɟɒʃtárʃɒinɒk fiɒin éʃ ɛzɛknɛk ɒ huɡɒ támár ʃɒlɒmonːɒk pɛdiɡ fiɒ roboám ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒbijɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒʃɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ joʃɒfát ɛnːɛk fiɒ jórám ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒkháziɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ joáʃ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒmáʃiɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒzáriɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ jótám ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒkház ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛzékiáʃ ɛnːɛk fiɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒmon ɛnːɛk fiɒ jóʃiáʃ jóʃiáʃnɒk pɛdiɡ fiɒi ɛlʃõsülötːɛ johɒnán máʃodik jójákim hɒrmɒdik ʃédékiáʃ ʃɒlːum nɛɟɛdik jójákim fiɒi ɒz fiɒ jékoniáʃ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ʃédékiáʃ jékóniáʃnɒk fiɒi ɒʃːir ɛnːɛk fiɒ ʃɒálthiɛl Éʃ málkirám pɛdájɒ ʃénɒʃár jékámiɒ hoʃámɒ éʃ nédábiɒ pɛdájɒ fiɒi zɛrubábɛl éʃ ʃimɛi zɛrubábɛl fiɒi mɛʃulːám hɒnániɒ éʃ ɒz huɡok vɒlɒ ʃɛlómit háʃubɒ ohɛl bɛrɛkiɒ hɒʃádiɒ éʃ juʃábhéʃɛd ɛzɛk ötɛn nániɒ fiɒi pɛlátiɒ éʃ jéʃɒiɒ éʃ rɛfájɒ fiɒi éʃ ɒrnám fiɒi obádiɒ fiɒi ʃɛkániɒ fiɒi Éʃ ʃɛkániɒ fiɒi ʃɛmájɒ ʃɛmájɒ fiɒi hɒtːuʃ jiɡɛál báriɒh nɛárjɒ éʃ ʃáfát ɛzɛk hɒtɒn nɛárjɒ fiɒi ɛljohénɒi ɛzékiáʃ éʃ ɒzrikám ɛzɛk hármɒn johénɒi fiɒi hódɒjévɒ ɛliáʃib pɛlájɒ ɒkːub johɒnán dɛlájɒ éʃ ɒnáni ɛzɛk hɛtɛn dɒ fiɒi ɛzɛk pérɛt͡sz khɛt͡szrón kármi húr éʃ ʃobál rɛájɒ pɛdiɡ ɒ ʃobál fiɒ nɛmzé jáhátot jáhát nɛmzé ɒhumáit éʃ lɒhádot ɛzɛk ɒ ʃorɒtɛuʃok háznépɛi ɛzɛk ɛtám ɒcjától vɒlók jɛzréɛl jiʃmɒ jidbáʃ éʃ ɒz huɡoknɒk nɛvɛ hɒʃlɛlponi pénuɛl pɛdiɡ ɡɛdor ɒcjɒ éʃ ɛzɛr húʃɒ ɒcjɒ ɛzɛk ɛfrɒtɒ ɛlʃõsülötːénɛk húrnɒk fiɒi ɒ bɛthlɛhɛm ɒcjɒ vɒlɒ ɒʃhúrnɒk pɛdiɡ ɒ tékoɒ ɒcjánɒk fɛlɛʃéɡɛ hɛléɒ éʃ nɒárɒ Éʃ nɒárɒ sülé ɒhuzámot héfɛrt tɛménit éʃ ɒhɒʃtárit ɛzɛk ɒ nɒárɒ fiɒi léɒ fiɒi ʃérɛt jéʃohár ɛtnán éʃ kót͡sz kót͡sz pɛdiɡ nɛmzé hánubot háʃobébát éʃ ɒhárhɛl ɒ hárumnɒk fiɒ vɒlɒ jábɛʃ pɛdiɡ tɛʃtvérɛinél tistɛlɛtrɛméltóbː vɒlɒ éʃ ɒzért nɛvɛzé ɒz ɒɲjɒ jábɛʃnɛk mivɛlhoɟ fájdɒlomːɒl sülém Éʃ jábɛʃ ɒz izráɛl iʃtɛnét ʃɛɡítʃéɡül hɒ ɛnɡɛm mɛɡáldɒnál éʃ ɒz hɒtáromɒt mɛɡsélɛʃítɛnéd éʃ ɒ tɛ kɛzɛd vɛlɛm lɛnːɛ éʃ ɛnɡɛm mindɛn vɛsɛdɛlɛmtõl mɛɡoltɒlmɒznál hoɟ nɛ láʃːɒk Éʃ mɛɡɒdá iʃtɛn ɒ vɒlɒ kélub pɛdiɡ ɒ ʃúkhɒ tɛʃtvérɛ nɛmzé méhirt ɛz ɒz ɛʃton ɒcjɒ ɛʃton nɛmzé béthrɒfát pɒʃɛákhot tɛhinːát irnáháʃ ɒcját ɛzɛk ɒ rékától vɒló férfiɒk kénáz fiɒi othniɛl éʃ ʃɛrájɒ othniɛl fiɒ hɒtát mɛonótɒi nɛmzé ofrát ʃɛrájɒ pɛdiɡ nɛmzé joábot ɒ ɡé hɒrɒʃimbɛliɛk ɒcját mɛrt mɛʃtɛrɛmbɛrɛk vɒlánɒk kálɛb fiɒi jɛfunːé fiɒ vɒlɒ iru ɛlɒ éʃ nɒám éʃ ɛlɒ fiɒi éʃ kénáz jéhɒlélɛl fiɒi zif zifɒ tirjɒ éʃ ɒʃárɛl ɛzrɒ fiɒi jétɛr mérɛd ɛfɛr éʃ jálon éʃ sülé mirjámot ʃɒmːɒit éʃ iʃbát ɛʃtɛmóɒ ɒcját ɛnːɛk fɛlɛʃéɡɛ pɛdiɡ jɛhudéjɒ sülé jérɛdɛt ɒ ɡɛdor ɒcját éʃ hébɛrt ɒ sókó ɒcját jékuthiɛlt ɒ zánoɒh ɒcját ɛzɛk bithiánɒk ɒ fɒrɒó lɛáɲánɒk fiɒi ɒ mérɛd ɛlvɛtː vɒlɒ hódiɒ nɛvû fɛlɛʃéɡénɛk pɛdiɡ fiɒi nɒhɒmnɒk kɛilɒ ɒcjánɒk nõvérɛ vɒlɒ hɒɡármi éʃ ɒ mɒɒkátbɛli ɛʃtɛmóɒ ʃimon fiɒi ɒmnon rinːɒ bɛnhɒnán éʃ thilon iʃi fiɒi zohét éʃ bɛnzohét júdɒ fiánɒk ʃélánɒk fiɒi ɛr lékɒ ɒcjɒ éʃ lɒádɒ mɒréʃɒ ɒcjɒ éʃ ɒ ɟɒpotsövõk háznépɛ béthɒʃbɛábɒn jókim éʃ kozɛbɒ lɒkoʃɒi éʃ joáʃ éʃ ʃɒráf ɒ moáb urɒi voltɒk éʃ jáʃubi léhɛm dɛ ɛzɛk réɡi dolɡok ɛzɛk voltɒk ɒ fɒzɛkɒʃok éʃ nɛtɒimbɒn éʃ ɡɛdɛrábɒn lɒktɒk ɒ kirájjɒl lɒktɒk otː ɒz dolɡáért ʃimɛon fiɒi némuɛl jámin járib zérɒh ʃɒul kinɛk fiɒ ʃɒlːum kinɛk fiɒ mibʃám kinɛk fiɒ miʃmɒ miʃmɒ fiɒi hɒmːúɛl ɒz fiɒ zɒkːur ɒz fiɒ ʃimi ɒz fiɒ ʃiminɛk tizɛnhɒt fiɒ éʃ hɒt lɛáɲɒ dɛ tɛʃtvérɛinɛk nɛm ʃok fiɒ ʃ áltɒlábɒn nɛm oj népɛʃ júdɒ fiɒié lɒkoznɒk vɒlɒ pɛdiɡ bɛɛrʃɛbábɒn éʃ mólɒdábɒn éʃ hɒt͡szɒr ʃuálbɒn bilhábɒn ɛt͡szɛmbɛn éʃ toládbɒn bétuɛlbɛn hormábɒn éʃ t͡szikláɡbɒn bɛthmɒrkɒbótbɒn hɒt͡szɒrsusimbɒn bɛthbiribɛn éʃ ʃɒárɒimbɒn ɛzɛk vɒlánɒk ɒz vároʃɒik mindɒdːiɡ míɡ dávid kirájjá lɛtː pɛdiɡ ɛzɛk ɛtám ɒin rimːon tókɛn éʃ ɒʃán vároʃ Éʃ mindɒzok ɒ fɒlvɒik ɒ mɛjɛk ɛ vároʃok voltɒk báliɡ ɛzɛk vɒlánɒk lɒkóhɛjɛik éʃ nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛik mɛʃobáb jámlɛk éʃ jóʃɒ ɒmáʃiɒ fiɒ jóɛl éʃ jéhu ɒ jóʃibiɒ fiɒ ʃɛrájɒ fiɒ ɒʃiɛl fiɒ vɒlɒ Éʃ ɛljoénɒi jɒákobɒ jéʃohájɒ ɒʃájɒ ɒdiɛl jɛʃiméɛl éʃ bɛnájɒ zizɒ ɒ ʃifi fiɒ ɒlon fiɒ jɛdájɒ fiɒ ʃimri fiɒ ʃɛmájɒ fiɒ ɛzɛk ɒ névsɛrint fɛlʃoroltɒk voltɒk ɒ fõɛmbɛrɛk nɛmzɛtʃéɡökbɛn ɒ iɡɛn ɛlsɒporodtɒk ɒcjok házábɒn ɛlindulánɒk ɡɛdor fɛlé hoɟ ɒ völɟ kɛlɛti résérɛ mɛnjɛnɛk éʃ otː bɒrmɒiknɒk lɛɡɛlõt kɛrɛʃːɛnɛk tɒlálánɒk iʃ ʒíroʃ éʃ lɛɡɛltɛtõ hɛjɛt ɒz ɒ pɛdiɡ táɡɒʃ ɲuɡodɒlmɒʃ éʃ békɛʃːéɡɛʃ mɛrt khámból vɒlók lɒktɒk otː ɒzɛlõtː mɛnvén pɛdiɡ ɛ névsɛrint mɛɡnɛvɛzɛtːɛk ɛzékiáʃnɒk ɒ júdɒ kirájánɒk idɛjébɛn lɛrombolták ʃátorɒikɒt éʃ ɒ mɒonitákɒt ɒ kikɛt otː tɒláltɒk kiirtotːák ɛ mɒi nɒpiɡ ʃ hɛjökbɛ lɛtɛlɛpɛdénɛk mivɛl otː bɒrmɒik sámárɒ lɛɡɛlõhɛjɛkɛt tɒláltɒk ɒ ʃimɛon fiɒi némɛjɛk ɛlmɛnénɛk ɒ ʃɛir hɛɟérɛ úɟmint ötsázɒn ɒ kiknɛk ɛlõljáróik ɒz iʃi fiɒi pɛlátjɒ nɛhárjɒ rɛfájɒ éʃ uzriɛl voltɒk Éʃ vɒlɒkik ɒz ɒmálɛk nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl mɛɡmɒrɒdtɒk vɒlɒ lɛváɡák ɒzokɒt éʃ otː lɛtɛlɛpɛdénɛk ɛ mɒi nɒpiɡ rúbɛnːɛk izráɛl ɛlʃõsülötːénɛk fiɒi mɛrt ɒz ɛlʃõsülötː pɛdiɡ mɛɡfɛrtõztɛtːɛ ɒz ɒcjánɒk áɟɒʃházát ɒz ɛlʃõsülötːʃéɡi joɡɒ ɒ jóʒɛf fiɒinɒk ɒdɒték ɒ izráɛl fiɒ vɒlɒ mindɒzáltɒl nɛm úɟ hoɟ nɛvɛztɛʃːɛnɛk sármɒzáʃ sɛrint ɛlʃõsülötːɛknɛk júdɒ tɛkintéjɛʃɛbː vɒlɒ ɒz tɛʃtvérɛi közötː éʃ bɛlõlɛ vɒló ɒ fɛjɛdɛlɛm hɒnɛm ɒz ɛlʃõsülötːʃéɡnɛk hɒsnɒ jóʒɛfé zɛk rúbɛnːɛk izráɛl ɛlʃõsülötːénɛk fiɒi khánokh pɒlːu khɛt͡szrón éʃ kármi jóɛl fiɒi ʃɛmájɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɡóɡ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ʃimɛi ɛnːɛk fiɒ mikɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ rɛájɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ bɒál ɛnːɛk fiɒ bɛérɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒ foɡʃáɡbɒ vitː tiɡlátpiléʃɛr ɒz ɒʃːiriɒbɛli kiráj ɒ rúbɛniták fɛjɛdɛlmɛ vɒlɒ ʃtvérɛi pɛdiɡ t͡ʃɒládjɒik nɛmzɛtʃéɡük mɛɡsámláláʃɒ sɛrint ɛzɛk vɒlánɒk ɒ jéhiɛl éʃ zɒkɒriáʃ bɛlɒ ɒzáz fiɒ ʃémɒ fiɒ jóɛl fiɒ vɒlɒ ɒróɛrbɛn lɒkotː nébóiɡ éʃ bɒálmɛoniɡ nɒpkɛlɛt fɛlé iʃ lɒkik vɒlɒ ɒ pustábɒn vɒló bɛmɛnɛtɛliɡ ɒz ɛufrátɛʃ fojóvíztõl foɡvɒ mɛrt ɒz bɒrmɒi ɡilɛád iɡɛn ɛlsɒporodtɒk kirájnɒk idɛjébɛn pɛdiɡ támɒstánɒk hɒdɒt ɒ háɡárénuʃok ɛlːɛn éʃ ɛlhulːánɒk ɒzok ɒz kɛzɛik áltɒl éʃ lɒkánɒk ɒzoknɒk ʃátorɒikbɒn ɡilɛádnɒk nɒpkɛlɛt fɛlé vɒló ɛɡés résébɛn ɒ ɡád fiɒi pɛdiɡ vɛlök sɛmbɛn ɒ báʃán lɒktɒk sɒlkáiɡ jóɛl vɒlɒ ɛlõljárójok ʃáfám máʃodik ɒz johánɒi éʃ ʃáfát báʃánbɒn tɛʃtvérɛik t͡ʃɒládjɒik sɛrint ɛzɛk mikáɛl méʃulːám ʃébɒ jórɒi jɒékán ziɒ éʃ Ébɛr hɛtɛn ɛzɛk ɒz ɒbihɒil fiɒi húri fiɒ jároáh fiɒ ɡilɛád fiɒ mikáɛl fiɒ jéʃiʃɒi fiɒ jɒhɒdó fiɒ búz fiɒ ʃ ɒhi ɒ ɡúni fiánɒk ɒbdiɛlnɛk ɒ fiɒ ɒ t͡ʃɒlád fɛjɛ zɛk ɡilɛádbɒn báʃánbɒn éʃ ɒz ɛzɛkhɛz tɒrtozó mɛzõvároʃokbɒn lɒktɒk éʃ ʃáronːɒk mindɛn lɛɡɛlõjén hɒtárɒikiɡ kik mindɲájɒn mɛɡsámláltɒtánɒk jótámnɒk ɒ júdɒ kirájánɒk idɛjébɛn éʃ jɛroboámnɒk ɒz izráɛl kirájánɒk idɛjébɛn ɒ rúbɛn fiɒi éʃ ɒ ɡáditák éʃ ɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ félnɛmzɛtʃéɡɛ ɛrõʃ pɒiʒ éʃ fɛɟvɛrhordozó férfiɒk kézívɛʃɛk éʃ ɒ hɒdɒkozáʃbɒn jártɒʃok nɛɟvɛnːéɟɛzɛrhétsázhɒtvɒnɒn hɒrt͡szrɒ kés férfiɒk hɒdɒkozánɒk ɒ háɡárénuʃok ɛlːɛn jétúr náfiʃ éʃ nódáb ɛlːɛn Éʃ ɟõzɛdɛlmɛʃɛk lɛvénɛk ɒzokon éʃ kɛzɛkbɛ ɒdɒtánɒk ɒ háɡárénuʃok éʃ mindɒzok ɒ ɛzɛkːɛl vɒlánɒk mɛrt ɒz iʃtɛnhɛz kiáltánɒk hɒrt͡sz közbɛn éʃ mɛɡhɒlːɡɒtá õkɛt mɛrt bɛnːɛ bíztɒk Éʃ ɛlvivék ɒz bɒrmɒikɒt ötvɛnɛzɛr tɛvét kétsázötvɛnɛzɛr kétɛzɛr sɒmɒrɒt éʃ sázɛzɛr ɛmbɛrt ɒ ʃɛb miɒtː pɛdiɡ ʃokɒn ɛlhulːánɒk mɛrt iʃtɛntõl vɒlɒ ɒz ɒ hɒrt͡sz éʃ ɒzok hɛjén lɒkánɒk ɒ foɡʃáɡiɡ mɒnɒʃːɛ nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛ fɛlénɛk fiɒi pɛdiɡ ɒzon ɒ lɒktɒk ɒ mɛj báʃántól bɒálhɛrmoniɡ sɛniriɡ éʃ hɛrmon hɛɟéiɡ tɛrjɛdt mɛrt iɡɛn mɛɡʃokɒʃodtɒk vɒlɒ Éʃ ɛzɛk voltɒk ɒz ɒcjok háznépénɛk fɛjɛdɛlmɛi ɛfɛr iʃi ɛliɛl ɒzriɛl irméjɒ hodáviɒ éʃ jɒhdiɛl iɡɛn ɛrõʃ férfiɒk hírɛʃ férfiɒk ɒ ɒz ɒcjok háznépɛ közötː voltɒk vétkɛzénɛk pɛdiɡ ɒz ɒcjoknɒk iʃtɛnɛ ɛlːɛn mɛrt ɒ lɒkóinɒk bálváɲiʃtɛnɛivɛl pɒráználkodánɒk ɒ kikɛt ɒz iʃtɛn sɛmök ɛlõl ɛlpustítotː fɛlindítá ɒzért ɒz izráɛl iʃtɛnɛ pulnɒk ɒz ɒʃːiriɒbɛli kirájnɒk sívét éʃ tiɡlátpiléʃɛrnɛk ɒz ɒʃːiriɒi kirájnɒk sívét éʃ foɡvɒ ɛlvivé õkɛt ɒ rúbɛnitákɒt ɒ ɡáditákɒt éʃ ɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ félnɛmzɛtʃéɡét iʃ éʃ ɛlvivé õkɛt hɒláhbɒ éʃ háborbɒ hárábɒ éʃ ɒ ɡózán fojóvizéhɛz ɛ mɒi nɒpiɡ lévi fiɒi ɡɛrʃon kéhát éʃ mérári kéhát fiɒi pɛdiɡ ɒmrám iʃhár hɛbron éʃ uzːiɛl ɒmrám ɟɛrmɛkɛi mózɛʃ éʃ miriám fiɒi pɛdiɡ nádáb ɒbihu ɛlɛázár éʃ ithɒmár ɛlɛázár nɛmzé finɛáʃt finɛáʃ nɛmzé ɒbiʃuát ɒbiʃuɒ pɛdiɡ nɛmzé bukːit bukːi nɛmzé uzːit uzːi nɛmzé zɛráhiát zɛráhiɒ nɛmzé mérɒjótot mérɒjót nɛmzé ɒmáriát ɒmáriɒ nɛmzé ɒhitúbot ɒhitúb nɛmzé ʃádókot ʃádók nɛmzé ɒhimáháʃt ɒhimáháʃ nɛmzé ɒzáriát ɒzáriɒ nɛmzé jóhɒnánt jóhɒnán nɛmzé ɒzáriát ɛz ɒ pɒp ɒbːɒn ɒ házbɒn ɒ mɛjɛt ʃɒlɒmon jɛruʒálɛmbɛn építɛtː vɒlɒ ɒzáriɒ nɛmzé ɒmáriát ɒmáriɒ nɛmzé ɒhitúbot ɒhitúb nɛmzé ʃádókot ʃádók nɛmzé ʃɒlːumot ʃɒlːum nɛmzé hilkiát hilkiɒ nɛmzé ɒzáriát ɒzáriɒ nɛmzé ʃéráját ʃérájɒ nɛmzé jéhozɒdákot hozɒdák pɛdiɡ foɡʃáɡbɒ ménɛ ɒz júdát éʃ jɛruʒálɛmɛt foɡʃáɡbɒ vitɛté nɒbukodonozor áltɒl lévi fiɒi ɡɛrʃon kéhát éʃ mérári ɛzɛk ɒ ɡɛrʃon fiɒinɒk nɛvɛi libni éʃ ʃimhi kéhát fiɒi ɒmrám jit͡szhár khɛbron éʃ huzːiɛl mérári fiɒi mɒkhli éʃ muʃi ɛzɛk ɒ lévi háznépɛi ɒz nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛik sɛrint rʃonːɒk fiɒi liɡni ɒz fiɒ jáhát ɛnːɛk fiɒ zimɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ jóɒh ɛnːɛk fiɒ idːó ɛnːɛk fiɒ zérɒh ɛnːɛk fiɒ éʃ jéɒthérɒi ɛnːɛk fiɒ kéhát fiɒi ɒmːinádáb ɒz fiɒ kórákh ɛnːɛk fiɒ éʃ ɒsːir ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛlkánɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛbiáʃáf ɛnːɛk fiɒ éʃ ɒsːir ɛnːɛk fiɒ tákhát ɛnːɛk fiɒ uriɛl ɛnːɛk fiɒ uzːiɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ éʃ ʃɒul ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛlkánɒ fiɒi ɒmáʃɒi éʃ ɒhimót ɛlkánɒ ɛlkánɒ fiɒ ʃófɒi ɒz fiɒ éʃ náhát ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛliáb ɛnːɛk fiɒ jérohám ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛlkánɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ muɛl fiɒi pɛdiɡ ɒz ɛlʃõsülötː váʃni ɒ máʃodik ɒbijɒ mérári fiɒi mɒhli libni ɛnːɛk fiɒ ʃimhi ɛnːɛk fiɒ éʃ uzːɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ʃimɛɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ hɒɡːijɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ éʃ ɒʃájɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛk ɒzok ɒ kikɛt dávid álːítotː bɛ ɒz házábɒn ɒz énɛkléʃhɛz ɒz iʃtɛn ládájɒ ɛlhɛjɛztɛtɛtː Éʃ ɒ míɡ ʃɒlɒmon fɛlépíté ɒz jɛruʒálɛmbɛn ɒdːiɡ ɒ ɟülɛkɛzɛt ʃátorɒ ɛlõtː solɡáltɒk énɛkléʃːɛl éʃ álːotːɒk solɡálɒtbɒn ɒz rɛndjɛ sɛrint ɛzɛk pɛdiɡ ɒ solɡáltɒk éʃ ɒz fiɒik ɒ kéhátiták fiɒi hémán fõénɛklõ jóɛl fiɒ ʃámuɛl fiɒ ki ɛlkánɒ fiɒ jérohám fiɒ ɛliél fiɒ thóɒ fiɒ ki t͡szúf fiɒ ɛlkánɒ fiɒ mɒhát fiɒ ɒmáʃɒi fiɒ ki ɛlkánɒ fiɒ jóél fiɒ ɒzárjɒ fiɒ ʃéfániɒ fiɒ ki tákhát fiɒ ɒsːir fiɒ ɛbiáʃáf fiɒ kórákh fiɒ ki jit͡szhár fiɒ kéhát fiɒ lévi fiɒ izráɛl fiɒ ɛnːɛk tɛʃtvérɛ ɒʃáf ɒ jobːkɛzɛ fɛlõl álː vɒlɒ ɒʃáf ɒ bɛrɛkiáʃ fiɒ ʃimɛɒ fiɒ vɒlɒ ki mikáɛl fiɒ bɒháʃiɒ fiɒ mɛlkijɒ fiɒ ki ɛthni fiɒ zérɒh fiɒ ɒdájɒ fiɒ ki ɛtán fiɒ zimːɒ fiɒ ʃimhi fiɒ ki jáhát fiɒ ɡɛrʃon fiɒ lévi fiɒ vábːá ɒ mérári fiɒi ɒ ɒzokːɒl ɒcɒfiɒk vɒlánɒk bɒlkéz fɛlõl álːnɒk vɒlɒ ɛtán kiʃi fiɒ ɒbdi fiɒ mɒlːuk fiɒ ki kɒʃábjɒ fiɒ ɒmáʃiɒ fiɒ hilkiɒ fiɒ ki ɒmʃi fiɒ báni fiɒ ʃémɛr fiɒ ki mɒkhli fiɒ muʃi fiɒ mérári fiɒ lévi fiɒ Éʃ tɛʃtvérɛik ɒ léviták rɛndɛltɛtnɛk vɒlɒ ɒz iʃtɛn házɒ hɒjlékánɒk ɛɟéb solɡálɒtjárɒ pɛdiɡ éʃ ɒz fiɒi ɒz ɛɡésɛn mɛɡéɡɛtɛndõ áldozɒtnɒk oltárɒ mɛlːé éʃ ɒ füʃtölõ mɛlːé ɒ sɛntɛksɛntjénɛk solɡálɒtjɒ mɛlːé éʃ ɒz izráɛl mɛɡsɛntɛléʃérɛ rɛndɛltɛténɛk ɒ sɛrint ɒ mózɛʃ ɒz iʃtɛn solɡájɒ mɛɡpɒrɒnt͡ʃoltɒ fiɒi pɛdiɡ ɛzɛk ɛlɛázár ɒz fiɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ finɛáʃ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒbiʃuɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ bukːi ɛnːɛk fiɒ uzːi ɛnːɛk fiɒ zɛrájɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ mɛrájót ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒmárjɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒkhitúb ɛnːɛk fiɒ ʃádók ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒkhimáʃ Éʃ ɒz fiɒinɒk ɒ kéhátiták nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɛzɛk ɒ lɒkhɛjɛik lɛtɛlɛpɛdéʃük sɛrint ɒz mɛrt ɛz jutotː ʃorʃ áltɒl kɒpták hɛbront ɒ júdɒ földébɛn éʃ ɒ körültɛ vɒló lɛɡɛlõkɛt dɛ ɛ vároʃ földjɛit éʃ ɒnːɒk fɒluit kálɛbnɛk ɒ jɛfunːé fiánɒk ɒdák ɒz fiɒinɒk ɒzért ɒ júdɒ vároʃɒi ɒdák ɒ mɛnɛdékvároʃokɒt hɛbront libnát éʃ lɛɡɛlõit jɒtːhirt éʃ ɛʃthɛmoát éʃ ɛzɛknɛk lɛɡɛlõit Éʃ hilɛnt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit éʃ débirt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒʃánt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit éʃ béthʃɛmɛʃt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit bɛnjámin nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɡébát éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒlːémɛtɛt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒnɒtót vároʃt iʃ éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɛzɛknɛk ɒz nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛk sɛrint tizɛnhárom vároʃuk ɒ kéhát töbːi fiɒinɒk pɛdiɡ ɒz ɛɟ nɛmzɛtʃéɡnɛk t͡ʃɒládjɒitól éʃ ɒ félnɛmzɛtʃéɡbõl ɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ nɛmzɛtʃéɡénɛk fɛlétõl ʃorʃ áltɒl vároʃt ɒdtɒk ɡ ɒ ɡɛrʃon fiɒinɒk mɛɡ ɒz nɛmzɛtʃéɡök sɛrint ɒz iʒɒkhár nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɒz Áʃɛr nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɒ nɒfthɒli nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl éʃ ɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl báʃánbɒn ɒdtɒk tizɛnhárom vároʃt ɒ mérári fiɒinɒk ɒz nɛmzɛtʃéɡök sɛrint ɒ rúbɛn nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɒ ɡád nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl éʃ ɒ zɛbulon nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ʃorʃ áltɒl tizɛnkét vároʃt ɒdánɒk tɛhát ɒz izráɛl fiɒi ɒ lévitáknɒk vároʃokɒt ɒzoknɒk lɛɡɛlõivɛl ɛɟütː ʃorʃ áltɒl ɒdták ɒ júdɒ nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɒ ʃimɛon nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl éʃ ɒ bɛnjámin nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɛzɛkɛt ɒ névsɛrint mɛɡnɛvɛzɛtː vároʃokɒt oknɒk ɒ ɒ kéhát fiɒinɒk t͡ʃɒládjɒiból vɒlók voltɒk éʃ ɒ hɒtárukbɒn lɛvõ vároʃok ɒz ɛfrɒim nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl vɒlánɒk ɒzoknɒk ɒdák ɒ mɛnɛdékvároʃokɒt ʃikɛmɛt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒz ɛfrɒim hɛɟén ɡézɛrt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit Éʃ jokmɛámot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit bɛthoront éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒjɒlont éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɡáthrimːont iʃ éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ nɛmzɛtʃéɡénɛk fɛlébõl ɒnɛrt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit bilɛámot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒ kéhát töbːi fiɒinɒk t͡ʃɒládjɒi résérɛ ɡɛrʃon fiɒinɒk pɛdiɡ ɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ félnɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɡólánt báʃánbɒn éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit éʃ ɒʃtɒrótot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit iʒɒkhár nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɒdák kédɛʃt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit dobrátot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit rámótot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒnémɛt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒz Áʃɛr nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl máʃált éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit éʃ ɒbdont éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit hukókot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit réhobot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒ nɒfthɒli nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl kédɛʃt ɡɒlilɛábɒn éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit hɒmːont éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit éʃ kirjáthɒimot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒ mérári töbːi fiɒinɒk ɒ zɛbulon nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl rimːont éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit éʃ thábort éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒ jordánon jérikhó ɛlːɛnébɛn ɒ jordánːɒk nɒpkɛlɛt fɛlõl vɒló résébɛn ɒ rúbɛn nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl béʃɛrt ɒ pustábɒn éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit jɒháʃát éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit kɛdɛmótot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit mɛfɒátot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit ɒ ɡád nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl rámótot ɡilɛádbɒn éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit mɒhɒnɒimot éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit hɛʃbont éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit jɒázɛrt éʃ ɒnːɒk lɛɡɛlõit iʒɒkhár fiɒi thólɒ puɒ jáʃub éʃ ʃimron néɟɛn ólɒ fiɒi pɛdiɡ uzːi réfájɒ jériɛl jɒkhmɒi jibʃám éʃ ʃámuɛl fɛjɛdɛlmɛk vɒlánɒk ɒz ɒcjɒiknɒk t͡ʃɒládjɒibɒn ɒ thólɒ fiɒi ɛrõʃ hɒdɒkozók voltɒk nɛmzɛtʃéɡökbɛn kiknɛk sámɒ dávid kiráj idɛjébɛn husonkétɛzɛrhɒtsáz vɒlɒ uzːi fiɒi izráhjɒ éʃ ɒz izráhjɒ fiɒi mikáɛl obádiɒ joɛl iʃːiɒ ötɛn ɒ fõɛmbɛrɛk vɒlánɒk közötːük nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛik éʃ t͡ʃɒládjɒik sɛrint hɒrmint͡szhɒtɛzɛr hɒdɒkozó mɛrt ʃok fɛlɛʃéɡök éʃ ʃok iʃ ɛzɛknɛk tɛʃtvérɛik iʃ iʒɒkhárnɒk ɛɡés nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛ sɛrint ɛrõʃ hɒdɒkozó férfiɒk vɒlánɒk ɲolt͡szvɒnhétɛzɛrɛn sám sɛrint mindɛnɛʃtõl fiɒi bɛlɒ békɛr éʃ jɛdiáɛl hármɒn bɛlɒ fiɒi ɛʃbon uzːi uzːiɛl jérimót éʃ hiri fõɛmbɛr ɒz nɛmzɛtʃéɡökbɛn ɛrõʃ hɒdɒkozó férfiɒk ɒ mɛɡsámláltɒtván husonkétɛzɛrhɒrmint͡sznéɟɛn vɒlánɒk békɛr fiɒi zémirɒ joáʃ ɛliézɛr ɛljoénɒi omri jɛrɛmót ɒbijɒ ɒnɒtót éʃ ɒlémɛt ɛzɛk mindɲájɒn békɛr fiɒi ɒzok mɛɡsámláltɒtván nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛik sɛrint t͡ʃɒládjuk fɛjɛi éʃ ɒz ɛrõʃ hɒdɒkozó férfiɒk húsɛzɛrkétsázɒn vɒlánɒk továbːá jédiáɛl fiɒ bilhán bilhán fiɒi jéuʃ bɛnjámin kénɒánɒ zɛtán tárʃiʃ éʃ ɒhiʃɒhár ɛzɛk jédiáɛl fiɒi t͡ʃɒládfõk ɛrõʃ hɒdɒkozó férfiɒk ɒ tizɛnhétɛzɛrkétsázɒn mɛhɛtnɛk vɒlɒ ɒ viɒdɒlrɒ ir fiɒi ʃupːim éʃ khupːim húʃim ɒhɛrnɛk fiɒ nɒfthɒli fiɒi jɒkht͡sziɛl ɡúni jét͡szɛr ʃɒlːum ɒ bilhɒ fiɒi nɒʃːɛ fiɒi ɒsriɛl sülɛ ɒz fɛlɛʃéɡɛ ɒz áɟɒʃtárʃɒ pɛdiɡ ɒ ʃiriɒbɛli ɒsːoɲ sülé mákirt ɒ ɡilɛád ɒcját mákir pɛdiɡ vɛvé fɛlɛʃéɡül khupːimnɒk éʃ ʃupːimnɒk huɡát kinɛk nɛvɛ mɒákɒ ɒ máʃiknɒk nɛvɛ t͡szélofhád t͡szélofhádnɒk lɛáɲɒi voltɒk mɒákɒ ɒ mákir fɛlɛʃéɡɛ sülɛ fiɒt ɒ nɛvɛzɛ pérɛʃnɛk ɒnːɒk pɛdiɡ öt͡ʃt͡ʃét ʃérɛʃnɛk ɛnːɛk fiɒi ulám éʃ rékɛm ulám fiɒ bédán ɛzɛk ɒ ɡilɛád fiɒi mákir fiɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ fiɒ ɒz huɡɒ molékɛt pɛdiɡ sülé iʃhodot ɒbiézɛrt éʃ mɒkhlát ʃɛmidánɒk fiɒi voltɒk ɒhián ʃɛkɛm likhi éʃ ɒniám ɛfrɒim fiɒi pɛdiɡ ʃútɛlákh kinɛk fiɒ bérɛd ɛnːɛk fiɒ táhát ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛlhɒdɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ táhát ɛnːɛk fiɒ zábád ɛnːɛk fiɒ ʃútɛlákh ɛzɛr éʃ ɛlhád Éʃ mɛɡölék ɛzɛkɛt ɒ ɡáthbɛliɛk ɒ földnɛk lɒkoʃɒi mɛrt ɒlámɛntɛk vɒlɒ hoɟ bɒrmɒikɒt ɛlhɒjtʃák ɛfrɒim ɒzért ɒz ɒcjok ʃokáiɡ ʃirɒtá õkɛt ɒ kihɛz ɛlmɛnːɛk vɒlɒ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒi éʃ viɡɒstɒlják vɒlɒ bɛménɛ ɒzért ɒz fɛlɛʃéɡéhɛz foɡɒdɒ méhébɛn éʃ sülɛ fiɒt éʃ nɛvɛzé bériánɒk mivɛlhoɟ sɛrɛnt͡ʃétlɛnʃéɡ ɒz házábɒn lɛáɲɒ pɛdiɡ ʃɛérɒ vɒlɒ ɒ ɒlʃó éʃ fɛlʃõ bɛthoront éʃ uzɛnʃɛérát réfɒh iʃ ɒz fiɒ éʃ rɛʃɛf ɛnːɛk fiɒ thélɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ táhán ɛnːɛk fiɒ lɒɒdán ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒmːihud ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛliʃámɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ nún ɛnːɛk fiɒ jóʒué ɛzɛknɛk éʃ lɒkóhɛjük vɒlɒ béthɛl éʃ ɒnːɒk mɛzõvároʃɒi nɒpkɛlɛtrɛ nɒɒrán nɒpɛɲésɛtrɛ ɡézɛr éʃ ɛnːɛk mɛzõvároʃɒi ʃikɛm éʃ ɛnːɛk mɛzõvároʃɒi sintɛ ɡázáiɡ éʃ ɒz ɛhːɛz tɒrtozó mɛzõvároʃokiɡ Éʃ ɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ fiɒi mɛlːɛtː béthʃɛán éʃ ɛnːɛk mɛzõvároʃɒi thɒɒnák éʃ ɛnːɛk mɛzõvároʃɒi mɛɡidːó éʃ ɛnːɛk mɛzõvároʃɒi dór éʃ ɛnːɛk mɛzõvároʃɒi ɛzɛkbɛn lɒktɒk ɒz izráɛl fiánɒk jóʒɛfnɛk fiɒi Áʃɛr fiɒi jimnɒh jiʃvɒh jiʃvi bɛrihɒ éʃ sɛrɒkh ɒz huɡok bɛrihɒ fiɒi khébɛr éʃ mɒlkhiɛl ɒ birzávit ɒcjɒ khébɛr pɛdiɡ nɛmzé jɒflétɛt ʃómɛrt hótámot éʃ ʃuát ɒz huɡokɒt jɒflét fiɒi páʃák bimhál ɒʃvát ɛzɛk jɒflét fiɒi ʃómɛr fiɒi ɒhi éʃ róhɛɡɒ jɛhubːɒ éʃ ɒrám tɛʃtvérénɛk hélɛmnɛk fiɒ vɒlɒ ʃófákh jimnɒ ʃélɛʃ éʃ ɒmál ʃófákh fiɒi ʃuákh hɒrnéfɛr ʃuál béri éʃ imrɒ béʃɛr hód ʃɒmːɒ ʃilʃɒ itrán éʃ bɛérɒ jétɛr fiɒi jéfunːé piʃpɒ éʃ ɒrɒ ulːɒ fiɒi ɒrɒ hɒnːiɛl éʃ riʃjɒ ɛzɛk Áʃɛr fiɒi t͡ʃɒládfõk váloɡɒtotː hɒrt͡szoʃok ɒ fɛjɛdɛlmɛk fɛjɛi éʃ mɛɡsámláltɒtván ɒz nɛmzɛtʃéɡök rɛndjɛ sɛrint husonhɒtɛzɛr hɒrt͡szrɒ képɛʃ bɛnjámin pɛdiɡ nɛmzé bɛlát ɒz ɛlʃõsülötːét máʃodikɒt ɒʃbélt hɒrmɒdikɒt ɒkhráhot nɛɟɛdikɛt nóhát éʃ ráját ötödikɛt bɛlánɒk fiɒi voltɒk ɒdár ɡérɒ éʃ ɒbihúd ɒbiʃuɒ nɒɒmán ɒhóɒh ɡérát ʃɛfufánt éʃ hurámot ɛk ɒz ɛhud fiɒi ɛzɛk voltɒk fõɛmbɛrɛk ɒ ɡébɒ vároʃábɒn lɒkó nɛmzɛtʃéɡ közötː kikɛt foɡʃáɡbɒ vitːɛk mɒnɒhátbɒ nɛvɛzɛtɛʃɛn nɒɒmánt éʃ ɒhiját éʃ ɡérát vitːék foɡʃáɡbɒ nɛmzé pɛdiɡ uzːát éʃ ɒkhihúdot ʃɒhɒráim pɛdiɡ nɛmzé ɒ moáb mɛzɛjén minɛkutánɒ ɛltɒsítá fɛlɛʃéɡɛit huʃimot éʃ bɒɒrát hódɛʃ nɛvû fɛlɛʃéɡétõl jobábot éʃ ʃibját méʃát éʃ mɒlkámot jéuʃt iʃ ʃokját éʃ mirmát ɛzɛk ɒz fiɒi fõɛmbɛrɛk ɒz nɛmzɛtʃéɡökbɛn huʃimtól nɛmzé ɒbitúbot éʃ ɛlpɒált ɛlpɒál fiɒi ɛbɛr miʃɛám éʃ ʃémɛr ɛz onót éʃ lódot éʃ ɛnːɛk mɛzõvároʃɒit bériɒ ʃémɒ ɛzɛk voltɒk ɒz ɒjɒlonbɒn lɒkozó nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛk éʃ ɛzɛk vɒlɒ ɛl ɡáthnɒk lɒkóit ɒhio ʃɒʃák jɛrɛmót zɛbádiɒ ɒrád ɒdɛr mikáɛl iʃpɒ jóhɒ bériɒ fiɒi zɛbádiɒ méʃulːám hizki hébɛr iʃmérɒi izliɒ éʃ jobáb ɛlpɒál fiɒi jákim zikri zɒbdi ɛliénɒi ʃilːɛtɒi ɛliɛl ɒdájɒ bɛrájɒ éʃ ʃimrát ʃimhi fiɒi jiʃpán ɛbɛr ɛliɛl ɒbdon zikri hɒnán hɒnánjɒ ɛlám ɒnɒtótijɒ ifdéjɒ pénuɛl ʃɒʃák fiɒi ʃɒmʃérɒi ʃɛhárjɒ ɒtáliɒ jɒɒréʃiɒ ɛliɒ éʃ zikri jérohám fiɒi ɛzɛk voltɒk ɒ t͡ʃɒládfõk ɒz nɛmzɛtʃéɡök sɛrint fõɛmbɛrɛk éʃ ɛzɛk lɒktɒk jɛruʒálɛmbɛn bɛonbɒn pɛdiɡ lɒktɒk ɡibɛonːɒk ɒcjɒ ɒz fɛlɛʃéɡénɛk nɛvɛ mɒɒkɒ vɒlɒ Éʃ ɒz ɛlʃõsülötːɛ ɒbdon ɒzután ʃúr kiʃ bɒál nádáb ɡɛdor ɒhio éʃ zékɛr miklót ɒ nɛmzé ʃimámot ɛzɛk iʃ tɛʃtvérɛiknɛk átɛlːɛnébɛn jɛruʒálɛmbɛn lɒktɒk tɛʃtvérɛikːɛl nér pɛdiɡ nɛmzé kiʃt kiʃ nɛmzé ʃɒult ʃɒul nɛmzé jonɒthánt mɒlkiʃuát ɒbinádábot éʃ ɛʃbɒált jonɒthán fiɒ méribːɒál méribːɒál nɛmzé mikát mikɒ fiɒi pitón mélɛk tárɛɒ éʃ ɒkház ɒkház nɛmzé jɛhoádát jɛhoádɒ pɛdiɡ nɛmzé ɒlémɛtɛt éʃ ɒzmávɛtɛt éʃ zimrit zimri nɛmzé móʃát móʃɒ pɛdiɡ binát ɛnːɛk fiɒ ráfɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛláʃɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɒʃɛl továbːá ɒʃɛlnɛk hɒt fiɒ kiknɛk ɛzɛk nɛvɛik ɒzrikám bókru iʃmáɛl ʃɛárjɒ obádiɒ éʃ hɒnán ɛzɛk ɒʃɛl fiɒi ɒz tɛʃtvérénɛk ɛʃɛknɛk fiɒi ɛzɛk ulám ɒz ɛlʃõsülötːɛ jéuʃ máʃodik éʃ ɛlifélɛt hɒrmɒdik ɒz ulám fiɒi ɛrõʃ hɒdɒkozó férfiɒk kézívɛʃɛk voltɒk ʃ ɟɛrmɛkɛik éʃ sázötvɛnrɛ sɒporodtɒk mindɛzɛk ɒ bɛnjámin fiɒi vɒlók voltɒk ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl mɛɡsámláltɒtván nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛik sɛrint bɛirɒtːɒk ɒz izráɛl éʃ júdɒ kirájɒinɒk köɲvébɛ ɒ ɡonosʃáɡukért bɒbilóniábɒ vitɛténɛk ɒ lɛɡɛlʃõ lɒkoʃok ɒz jósáɡɒikon ʃ vároʃɒikbɒn ɛzɛk izráɛliták pɒpok léviták éʃ nétinɛuʃok mɛrt jɛruʒálɛmbɛn lɒktɒk ɒ júdɒ fiɒi ʃ bɛnjámin fiɒi ɛfrɒim éʃ mɒnɒʃːɛ fiɒi vɒlók utái ɒmːihud fiɒ omri fiɒ imri fiɒ báni fiɒ ɒ pérɛt͡sz fiɒi vɒló júdɒ fiɒ vɒlɒ ɒ ʃilóniták ɒʃájɒ ɛlʃõsülötː vɒlɒ ʃ ɛnːɛk fiɒi ɒ zérɒh fiɒi jéuɛl éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒi hɒtsázkilɛnt͡szvɛnɛn ɒ bɛnjámin fiɒi ʃɒlːu méʃulːám fiɒ hodáviɒ fiɒ hɒʃénuɒ fiɒ néjɒ jérohám fiɒ éʃ ɛlɒ uzːi fiɒ mikri fiɒ éʃ méʃulːám ʃéfátjɒ fiɒ rɛuɛl fiɒ ibnijɒ fiɒ vɒlɒ tɛʃtvérɛik nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛik sɛrint kilɛnt͡sʒzázötvɛnhɒtɒn vɒlánɒk ɛzɛk t͡ʃɒládfõk voltɒk ɒz ɒcjok háznépɛ sɛrint ɒ pɒpok iʃ jɛdájɒ jéhojárib éʃ jákin ɒzáriɒ hilkiɒ fiɒ méʃulːám fiɒ ʃádók fiɒ mérɒjót fiɒ ɒhitubnɒk ɒz iʃtɛn házɒ fõɡondviʃɛlõjénɛk fiɒ vɒlɒ Éʃ ɒdájɒ jérohám fiɒ pɒʃhúr fiɒ málkijɒ fiɒ mɒɒʃɒi ɒdiɛl fiɒ jɒhzérɒ fiɒ méʃulːám fiɒ méʃilːémit fiɒ imːɛr fiɒ ɛknɛk ɒcjokfiɒi ɒz t͡ʃɒládjɒiknɒk fɛjɛi ɛzɛrhétsázhɒtvɒnɒn vɒlánɒk buzɡók ɒz iʃtɛn házɒ dolɡánɒk munkájábɒn ɒ léviták ʃɛmájɒ háʃub fiɒ ɒzrikám fiɒ hɒʃábiɒ fiɒ ɒ mérári fiɒi bɒkbɒkːár hérɛʃ éʃ ɡɒlál éʃ mɒtːániɒ ɒ mikɒ fiɒ zikri fiɒ ɒʃáf fiɒ vɒlɒ obádiɒ ɒ ʃɛmájɒ fiɒ ɡɒlál fiɒ jédutun fiɒ éʃ bérékiɒ ɒʃɒ fiɒ ɛlkánɒ fiɒ ɒ nétofáti fɒluibɒn lɒkik vɒlɒ ɒz ɒjtónálːók ʃɒlːum ɒkːúb tɒlmon ɒhimán éʃ ɛzɛk tɛʃtvérɛi ʃɒlːum pɛdiɡ vɒlɒ ʃ ɛnːɛk mindɛz idɛiɡ ɒ kirájkɒpun vɒn hɛjɛ nɒpkɛlɛt fɛlõl ɛzɛk ɒz ɒjtónálːók ɒ léviták rɛndjɛ sɛrint ʃɒlːum pɛdiɡ ɒ kóré fiɒ ɛbiáʃáf fiɒ kórákh fiɒ éʃ ɛnːɛk rokonʃáɡɒi ɒ kórɒkhiták t͡ʃɒládjából ɒ solɡálɒt munkájábɒn ɒ hɒjlék ɒjtɒjánɒk vɒlánɒk ɒz ɒcáik ɒz ʃɛrɛɡébɛn vɒlɒ ɒ bɛjárɒtot mikor finɛáʃ ɒz ɛlɛázár fiɒ ɛɟkor ɒz ɛlõljárójok kivɛl ɒz vɒlɒ zɒkɒriáʃ ɒ mɛʃɛlémiɒ fiɒ ɒ ɟülɛkɛzɛt ʃátorábɒ vɒló bɛjárɒt õrizõjɛ ɛzɛk válɒstotː ɒjtónálːók voltɒk kétsáztizɛnkɛtːɛn ɒz fɒluikbɒn nɛmzɛtʃéɡök sɛrint mɛɡsámláltɒtːɒk kikɛt dávid rɛndɛlt éʃ ʃámuɛl prófétɒ ɒz tistökbɛ éʃ fiɒik vɒlɒ rɛndːɛl ɒz házánɒk ɒ ʃátornɒk kɒpuit néɟfɛlé vɒlánɒk ɒz nɒpkɛlɛtrɛ nɒpɲuɡotrɒ ésɒkrɒ éʃ délrɛ ɛzɛknɛk ɒcjokfiɒi ɒz fɒluikbɒn vɒlánɒk dɛ mindɛn hɛtɛdnɒp ɒmɒzokhoz fɛlmɛnénɛk jɛruʒálɛmbɛ bizoɲoʃ idɛiɡ dɛ ɒ kɒpunálːók néɟ fõɛmbɛrénɛk álːɒndó mɛɡbizɒtáʃuk ɛzɛk ɒ léviták vɒlɒ ɒ kɒmɒrákɒt éʃ ɒz iʃtɛn házánɒk kint͡ʃɛit Éʃ ɒz Úrnɒk házɒ hálnɒk vɒlɒ mivɛlhoɟ ɒz õrzéʃ ɒz tistök éʃ mindɛn rɛɡːɛl ɲitják vɒlɒ mɛɡ ɒz ɒjtókɒt némɛjɛk ɒ solɡálɒti ɛdéɲɛkrɛ viʃɛlnɛk vɒlɒ ɡondot mɛrt ɒ kivitɛlnél ɒ visːɒvitɛlnél sámon vɛsik vɒlɒ ɒzokɒt iɒnɒzok válɒstɒtːɒk vɒlɒ némɛjɛk máʃfélɛ ɛdéɲnɛk ɒ sɛnthɛj mindɛn ɛsközɛinɛk ɒ listnɛk bornɒk olɒjnɒk tömjénːɛk éʃ fûsɛrɛknɛk ɡondviʃɛléʃérɛ ɒ pɒpok fiɒi vɒlók t͡ʃinálják vɒlɒ fûsɛrɛkbõl ɒ dráɡɒkɛnɛtɛt iʃ továbːá mɒtːitjɒ ɒ léviták vɒló ɛlʃõsülötːɛ ɒ kórɒkhiták vɒló ʃɒlːumnɒk ɒ ʃɛrpɛɲõkrɛ viʃɛl vɒlɒ ɡondot kéhátiták fiɒi éʃ ɒzok ɒcjokfiɒi rɛndɛltɛtːɛk ɒ sɛnt kɛɲérnɛk ɡondviʃɛléʃérɛ hoɟ mindɛn sombɒton mɛɡkésítʃék ɒzt ɛk vɒlók vɒlánɒk ɒz énɛklõk iʃ ɒ léviták ɒ t͡ʃɒládfõk ɒ sɒbɒdoʃok vɒlánɒk ɛɟéb tistːõl ɒz kɒmɒrájokbɒn mɛrt éjːɛl éʃ nɒpːɒl solɡálɒtːɒl tɒrtoznɒk vɒlɒ ɛk ɒ léviták közötː t͡ʃɒládfõk nɛmzɛtʃéɡök sɛrint fõɛmbɛrɛk éʃ ɛzɛk jɛruʒálɛmbɛn lɒktɒk ɡibɛonbɒn pɛdiɡ lɒktɒk ɒ ɡibɛon ɒcjɒ jéhiɛl éʃ ɒz fɛlɛʃéɡénɛk nɛvɛ mɒɒkɒ ɒz ɛlʃõsülötː fiɒ ɒbdon ɒzután ʃúr kiʃ bɒál nér éʃ nádáb ɡɛdor ɒhió zékáriɒ éʃ miklót miklót pɛdiɡ nɛmzé ʃimámot ɛzɛk iʃ ɒz ɒcjokfiɒi átɛlːɛnébɛn lɒktɒk jɛruʒálɛmbɛn ɒz tɛʃtvérɛikːɛl nér nɛmzé kiʃt kiʃ nɛmzé ʃɒult ʃɒul pɛdiɡ nɛmzé jonɒthánt málkiʃuát ɒbinádábot éʃ ɛʃbɒált jonɒthán fiɒ méribːɒál éʃ méribːɒál nɛmzé mikát mikɒ fiɒi piton mélɛk éʃ táréɒ ɒkház pɛdiɡ nɛmzé jɒhrát jɒhrɒ nɛmzé ɒlémɛtɛt ɒzmávɛtɛt zimrit zimri pɛdiɡ nɛmzé móʃát móʃɒ nɛmzé binɛát ɛnːɛk fiɒ réfájɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ ɛláʃɒ ɛnːɛk fiɒ Áʃɛl Áʃɛlnɛk hɒt fiɒ kiknɛk nɛvɛik ɒzrikám bókru iʃmáɛl ʃɛárjɒ obádiɒ éʃ hɒnán ɛzɛk Áʃɛl fiɒi filistɛuʃok pɛdiɡ hɒdɒkoznɒk vɒlɒ ɒz izráɛlːɛl éʃ mɛɡfutɒmodék izráɛl népɛ ɒ filistɛuʃok ɛlõtː éʃ néháɲɒn ɒ ʃɛbɛk miɒtː ɛl iʃ hulːánɒk ɒ ɡilboɒ hɛɟén ɛlérék pɛdiɡ ɒ filistɛuʃok ʃɒult éʃ ɒz fiɒit éʃ mɛɡölék ɒ filistɛuʃok jonɒthánt ɒbinádábot éʃ mɒlkiʃuát ɒ ʃɒul fiɒit Éʃ ɒ viɒdɒl iɡɛn hɛvɛʃ ʃɒul éʃ rátɒlálván ɒ kézívɛʃɛk ɲilɒkːɒl mɛɡʃɛbɛʃíték Éʃ mondɒ ʃɒul ɒz fɛɟvɛrhordozójánɒk vond fɛɟvɛrɛdɛt éʃ vɛrj áltɒl ɛnɡɛm vɛlɛ mɛrt nɛtɒlán ɛljõnɛk ɛ körülmɛtélɛtlɛnɛk éʃ mɛɟːɒláznɒk ɛnɡɛmɛt dɛ fɛɟvɛrhordozójɒ nɛm ɒkɒrá mɛrt iɡɛn vɒlɒ rɒɡɒdá ɒzért ʃɒul ɒ fɛɟvɛrt éʃ bɛlé bot͡ʃátkozék látván pɛdiɡ ɒz fɛɟvɛrhordozójɒ hoɟ ʃɒul imːár mɛɡhɒlt iʃ ɒ fɛɟvɛrbɛ bot͡ʃátkozék éʃ mɛɡhɒlɒ mɛɡhɒlɒ ɒzért ʃɒul éʃ ɒz fiɒ éʃ ɛɡés háznépɛ iʃ ɛɟɛtɛmbɛn mɛɡhɒlɒ mikor pɛdiɡ mɛɡlátːák izráɛlnɛk mindɛn férfiɒi ɒ ɒ völɟbɛn vɒlánɒk hoɟ mɛɡfutɒmodtɒk éʃ hoɟ ʃɒul éʃ ɒz fiɒi mɛɡholtɒk pustán hɒɟák vároʃɒikɒt éʃ ɛlfutánɒk ɒkːor ɛljövénɛk ɒ filistɛuʃok éʃ ɒzokbɒ bɛsálːánɒk lõn pɛdiɡ máʃodnɒp ɛljövénɛk ɒ filistɛuʃok hoɟ ɒ holtɒkɒt kifossák éʃ mɛɡtɒlálák ʃɒult éʃ ɒz fiɒit hɒlvɒ fɛküdvén ɒ ɡilboɒ hɛɟén Éʃ kifosták éʃ ɛlvɛvék fɛjét éʃ ɒz fɛɟvɛrɛit éʃ ɛlküldék ɒ filistɛuʃok mindɛn tɒrtomáɲábɒ köröʃkörül hoɟ ɒdják bálváɲɒiknɒk éʃ ɒ népnɛk ɒz fɛɟvɛrɛit iʃtɛnɛik házábɒ hɛjɛzék ɛl fɛjét pɛdiɡ dáɡon tɛmplomábɒn ɒkɒstotːák fɛl mikor pɛdiɡ mɛɡhɒlːotːɒ ɒz ɛɡés jábɛʃɡilɛád hoɟ t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdtɛk ɒ filistɛuʃok ʃɒulːɒl fɛltámɒdánɒk mindɲájɒn ɒz ɛrõʃ férfiɒk éʃ ɛlvivék ʃɒulnɒk éʃ ɒz fiɒinɒk tɛʃtét éʃ jábɛʃbɛ ɛltɛmɛték ɒzoknɒk t͡ʃontjɒikɒt ɒ tölɟfɒ ɒlɒtː jábɛʃbɛn éʃ bõjtölénɛk hɛtɛdnɒpiɡ mɛɡhɒlɒ ɒzért ʃɒul ɒz ɡonosʃáɡɒ miɒtː mivɛl vétkɛzɛtː ɒz ɛlːɛn ɒz Úrnɒk iɡéjɛ ɛlːɛn mɛjɛt nɛm õrzötː mɛɡ ʃõt ɒz ördönɡöʃt iʃ mɛɡkɛrɛʃtɛ hoɟ mɛɡkérdɛzːɛ Éʃ nɛm ɒz urɒt ɛzért ɛlvɛsté éʃ ɒdá ɒz orsáɡát dávidnɒk ɒz iʃɒi fiánɒk Éʃ ɟûlénɛk ɒz izráɛliták mindɲájɒn dávidhoz hɛbronbɒ ɒ tɛ t͡ʃontod éʃ ɒ tɛ tɛʃtɛd vɒɟunk ɛzɛlõtː iʃ méɡ ʃɒul ɒ kiráj tɛ ɒz ɒ ɒz izráɛlt éʃ bɛvɛzɛtéd éʃ ɛzt mondotːɒ ɒ tɛ urɒd iʃtɛnɛd nékɛd tɛ lɛɡɛltɛtɛd ɒz népɛmɛt ɒz izráɛlt éʃ tɛ lɛsɛl vɛzér ɒz népɛmɛn ɒz izráɛlɛn ɛlmɛnénɛk ɒzért mindɲájɒn ɒz izráɛl vénɛi ɒ kirájhoz hɛbronbɒ éʃ sövɛtʃéɡɛt dávid vɛlök hɛbronbɒn ɒz ɛlõtː éʃ kirájjá kɛnték dávidot izráɛl fɛlɛtː ɒz Úrnɒk ʃámuɛl áltɒl vɒló bɛsédɛ sɛrint ɛlménɛ ɒkːor dávid éʃ ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl jɛruʒálɛmbɛ ɛz jɛbuʃ otː ɒ jɛbuzɛuʃok voltɒk ɒ lɒkoʃɒi Éʃ mondánɒk jɛbuʃ lɒkói dávidnɒk idɛ bɛ nɛm jösː dɛ mɛɡvɛvé dávid ɒ ʃion ɛz ɒ dávid vároʃɒ mɛrt ɛzt mondotːɒ vɒlɒ dávid ɒ lɛɡɛlõsör ɛɟ jɛbuzɛuʃt lɛváɡ ɛlõljáró éʃ vɛzér lɛɟɛn fɛlménɛ ɒzért lɛɡɛlõsör joáb ɒ ʃérujɒ fiɒ éʃ ɛlõljáróvá ɒzután lɒkék dávid ɒ várbɒn ɒzért nɛvɛzék ɒzt dávid vároʃánɒk Éʃ mɛɡépíté dávid ɒ vároʃt milːótól foɡvɒ ɛɡésɛn joáb pɛdiɡ mɛɡépíté ɒ vároʃnɒk mɒrɒdékát Éʃ fojtonoʃɒn ɛmɛlkɛdék dávid mɛrt ɒ ʃɛrɛɡɛk urɒ vɒlɒ vɛlɛ ɛzɛk pɛdiɡ ɒ hõʃök ɛlõljárói ɒ dávid mɛlːɛtː vɒlánɒk ɒ ɛrõʃɛn forɡolódánɒk vɛlɛ ɒz kirájʃáɡáért ɛɡés izráɛlːɛl hoɟ kirájjá válɒssák izráɛl fɛlɛtː ɒz bɛsédɛ sɛrint ɛzɛk sámsɛrint ɒ hõʃök ɒ dávid vɒlánɒk jáʃobɛám hɒkhmoni fiɒ ɒ hɒrmint͡sznɒk ɛlõljárójɒ ɛz ɛmɛltɛ vɒlɒ fɛl ɒz háromsáz ɛlːɛn ɒ kikɛt ɛɟsɛrːɛ mɛɡʃɛbɛʃítɛ ɛlɛázár ɒz ɒhóhitɒ dódó fiɒ ɒ ɒ hõʃ ɛɟ vɒlɒ vɒlɒ dávidːɒl pɒʃdɒmimbɒn ɒ ösːɛɟûlénɛk ɒ filistɛuʃok viɒdɒlrɒ ɛɟ dɒrɒb árpávɒl vɒlɒ tɛlɛ éʃ ɒ ɛlmɛnɛkült ɒ filistɛuʃok ɛlõl dɛ mɛɡálːánɒk otː ɒnːɒk ɒ dɒrɒb földnɛk ɒ közɛpén éʃ mɛɡtɒrtotːák ɒzt éʃ mɛɡvɛrék ɒ filistɛuʃokɒt éʃ ɒz mɛɡsɒbɒdítá õkɛt nɒɟ sɒbɒdítáʃːɒl továbːá ɒlámɛntɛk hármɒn ɒ hɒrmint͡sz fõɛmbɛr dávidhoz ɒ kõsiklához ɒz ɒdulːám bɒrlɒnɡjábɒ ɒ filistɛuʃok pɛdiɡ járánɒk ɒ réfɒim völɟbɛn dávid ɒz ɛrõʃːéɡbɛn vɒlɒ ɒkːor ɒ filistɛuʃok hɒdɒ pɛdiɡ bɛthlɛhɛmnél vánɒ dávid vizɛt éʃ mondɒ ɒdhɒtnɒ nékɛm inːom ɒ bɛthlɛhɛm kɒpujɒ ɛlõtː vɒló forːáʃnɒk ɒkːor kɛrɛstülváɡták mɒɡokɒt hármɒn ɒ filistɛuʃok éʃ vizɛt mɛríténɛk ɒ bɛthlɛhɛm forːáʃából mɛj ɒ kɒpu ɛlõtː vɒlɒ éʃ fɛlvivék éʃ mɛnénɛk dávidhoz dɛ dávid nɛm ɒkɒrɒ inːi hɒnɛm ɒzt ɒz Úrnɒk mondɒ távoztɒʃːɒ ɛl tõlɛm ɒz iʃtɛnɛm hoɟ ɛzt t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdném ɒvɒɟ ɛ férfiɒknɒk iɟɒmé mɛɡ ɒ élɛtökɛt hɒlálrɒ vɛtɛtːék mɛrt ɛzt élɛtök vɛsɛdɛlmévɛl Éʃ ʃɛmːiképɛn nɛm ɒkɒrɒ inːi ɛzt t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdé ɒ hõʃ ɒbiʃɒi ɒ joáb tɛʃtvérɛ vɒlɒ ɛ háromnɒk ɛlõljárójɒ rɒɡɒdotː vɒlɒ háromsáz ɛlːɛn ɒ kikɛt mɛɡʃɛbɛʃítɛ éʃ ɒ lɛɡhírɛʃɛbː ɒ közötː ɒ kɛtːõnél hírɛʃɛbː vɒlɒ ɒzért ɒzok ɛlõljárójɒ dɛ ɒzért ɛɟmɒɡɒ méɡ ʃɛm ɒ háromːɒl bɛnájɒ ɒ jojɒdɒ fiɒ férfiúnɒk fiɒ kɒbʃéɛlbõl ɒ nɒɟ dolɡokɒt t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdék öltɛ mɛɡ moáb oroslánját éʃ ménɛ ɒlá ɒ vɛrɛmbɛ ʃ öltɛ mɛɡ ɒz oroslánt hɒvɒʃ uɟɒnɛz mɛɡ ɒz Éɟiptombɛli ɒkinɛk mɒɡɒʃːáɡɒ ʃinɡ éʃ oj dárdɒ vɒlɒ ɒz Éɟiptombɛli kɛzébɛn ɒ sövõ zuɡoj sɛmbɛsálːɒ vɛlɛ ɛɟ pált͡szávɒl ʃ kirɒɡɒdá ɒz Éɟiptombɛli ɛmbɛr kɛzébõl ɒ éʃ ʃɒját dárdájávɒl áltɒlvɛré ɛzɛkɛt t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdtɛ bɛnájɒ ɒ jojɒdɒ fiɒ ɒ hírɛʃ vɒlɒ ɒ hõʃ közötː hírɛʃ vɒlɒ ɒ hɒrmint͡sz közötː dɛ ɒzːɒl ɒ háromːɒl nɛm fɛl Éʃ ɛlõljáróvá tɛvé dávid ɒ tɒnát͡ʃoʃok közötː ʃɛrɛɡnɛk pɛdiɡ ɛzɛk vitézɛi ɒʃɒɛl ɒ joáb tɛʃtvérɛ ɛlhɒnán dódónɒk fiɒ bɛthlɛhɛmbɛli vɒlɒ hɒróritból vɒló ʃɒmːót pélomból vɒló hélɛʃ tékoɒbɛli hirɒ ikːéʃ fiɒ ɒnɒtótbɛli ɒbiézɛr húʃɒtbɛli ʃibːékɒi ɒhóhitbɛli hirɒi nétofátbɛli mɒhɒrɒi nétofátbɛli hélɛd bɒhánɒ fiɒ itːɒi ribɒi fiɒ ɒ bɛnjámin fiɒinɒk ɡibɛɒ vároʃából vɒló pirátonbɛli bɛnájɒ húrɒi ɒ ɡɒáʃ völɟébõl vɒló ɒrbátbɛli ɒbiɛl bɒhɒrumi ɒzmávɛt ʃɒálbonitbɛli ɛliáhbɒ ɡiʃonbɛli háʃɛm fiɒi jonɒthán hɒrɒritbɛli ʃáɡé fiɒ hɒrɒritbɛli ɒhiám ʃákár fiɒ ɛlifál fiɒ mɛkɛrátbɛli héfɛr pélonbɛli ɒhijɒ kármɛlbõl vɒló héʃró nɒárɒi ɛzbái fiɒ jóɛl nátán tɛʃtvérɛ mibhár ɡéri fiɒ ʃélɛk ɒmːon nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl vɒló bɛrótbɛli nɒárɒi joábnɒk ɒ ʃérujɒ fiɒ vɒlɒ fɛɟvɛrhordozójɒ itrébɛli hirɒ itrébɛli ɡárɛb hitːɛuʃ uriáʃ zɒbád ɒhlɒi fiɒ hɒdinɒ ɒ rúbɛn nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl vɒló ʃizɒ fiɒ ɒ rúbɛniták ɛlõljárójɒ vɒlɒ éʃ vɛlɛ hɒrmint͡szɒn vɒlánɒk hɒnán mɒɒkɒ fiɒ éʃ mitnibɛli jóʃɒfát ɒʃtɛrátbɛli uzːijɒ ʃámɒ éʃ jéhiɛl ɒroɛrbɛli hótám fiɒi jidiháɛl ʃimri fiɒ éʃ ɒz tɛʃtvérɛ johɒ tiʃibɛli mihávimbɛli ɛliɛl jéribɒi éʃ jóʃáviɒ ɛlnɒám fiɒ éʃ jitmɒ moáb nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl vɒló ɛliɛl éʃ obɛd éʃ jɒáʃiɛl méʃóbájából vɒlók ɛzɛk ɒzok ɒ dávidhoz mɛnénɛk ʃikláɡbɒ ʃɒul ɒ kiʃ fiɒ miɒtː méɡ sámkivɛtéʃbɛn vɒlɒ ɒ ɒ hõʃöknɛk ɒ hɒrt͡szbɒn ʃɛɡítõi voltɒk ɛʃɛk ɒ jobː bɒlkézrɛ kõvɛl hɒjítɒnɒk éʃ ɲílːɒl lõnɛk vɒlɒ ɒ ʃɒul ɒcjɒfiɒi vɒlók vɒlánɒk bɛnjámin nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɛlõljáró vɒlɒ ɒhiézɛr éʃ joáʃ ɒ ɡibɛɒbɛli ʃɛmáɒ fiɒi éʃ jéziɛl éʃ pélɛt ɒzmávɛt fiɒi bɛrákɒ éʃ jéhu ɒnɒtótból Éʃ ɒ ɡibɛonbɛli iʃmájɒ ɒ hɒrmint͡sz vɒló hõʃ ɒ kiknɛk ɛlõljárójok iʃ vɒlɒ irméjɒ jɒháziɛl johɒnán éʃ ɡɛdɛrátbɛli józɒbád ɛlúzɒi jérimót bɛháliɒ ʃɛmáriɒ éʃ hárufbɛli ʃɛfátjɒ ɛlkánɒ iʃijɒ ɒzɒréɛl jóézɛr éʃ ɒ kóré nɛmzɛtébõl vɒló jáʃobéám joélɒ éʃ zɛbádjɒ ɒ ɡɛdorból vɒló jérohám fiɒi ɡáditák iʃ mɛnénɛk dávidhoz ɒ pustábɒn vɒlɒ ɒz ɛrõʃːéɡbɛn ɛrõʃ éʃ hɒdɒkozó férfiɒk pɒiʒoʃok dárdáʃok ɒ kiknɛk ort͡szájok ɒz oroslánːɒk ort͡szájɒ éʃ ɟorʃɒʃáɡrɒ hɒʃonlók ɒ hɛɟɛn lɒkozó vɒdkɛt͡ʃkékhɛz Ézɛr ɒz ɛlʃõ obádiɒ máʃodik ɛliáb hɒrmɒdik miʃmɒnːɒ nɛɟɛdik jirméjɒ ɒtːɒi hɒtodik ɛliɛl hɛtɛdik ɲolt͡szɒdik johɒnán kilɛnt͡szɛdik ɛlzɒbád tizɛdik jirméjɒ tizɛnɛɟɛdik mɒkbánːɒi ɛzɛk voltɒk fõɛmbɛrɛk ɒ ʃɛrɛɡbɛn ɒ ɡád fiɒi ɒ lɛɡkiʃɛbːɛk ɛɟikɛ sáz ɛlːɛn ɒ lɛɡnɒɟobːɒk ɛɟikɛ ɛzɛr ɛlːɛn ɛk ɒzok ɒ ɒ jordánon átmɛntɛk ɒz ɛlʃõ hónɒpbɒn nohɒ ɒz ɒ pɒrtot fɛlülmúltɒ éʃ ɛlûzték mindɒzokɒt ɒ ɒ völɟbɛn vɒlánɒk nɒpkɛlɛt fɛlõl éʃ nɒpɲuɡot fɛlõl jövénɛk dávidhoz ɒ bɛnjámin éʃ ɒ júdɒ fiɒi iʃ ɒz ɛrõʃːéɡbɛ kiménɛ dávid ɛlɛjökbɛ éʃ fɛlɛlvén mondɒ hoɟhɒ békɛʃːéɡ jötːök hozːám hoɟ ʃɛɡítʃéɡɛmrɛ lɛɟɛtɛk ɒz sívɛm ɛɟ lɛs vɛlɛtɛk hɒ pɛdiɡ mɛɡ ɒkɒrtok t͡ʃɒlni hoɟ ɛláruljɒtok ɒz ɛlːɛnʃéɡɛimnɛk holotː ʃɛmːi ɡonosʃáɡot nɛm kövɛtːɛm ɛl láʃːɒ mɛɡ ɒ ɒcáink iʃtɛnɛ éʃ büntɛʃːɛn mɛɡ lélɛk pɛdiɡ fɛlindítá ɒmáʃɒit ɒ hɒrmint͡sznɒk fɛjɛdɛlmét ʃ mondɒ dávid tiɛd vɒɟunk éʃ tɛ vɛlɛd lɛsünk iʃɒi fiɒ békɛʃːéɡ békɛʃːéɡ nékɛd békɛʃːéɡ ɒ tɛ ʃɛɡítõidnɛk iʃ mɛrt mɛɡʃɛɡít téɡɛd ɒ tɛ iʃtɛnɛd mɒɡához foɡɒdá ɒzért õkɛt dávid éʃ fõɛmbɛrɛkːé tɛvé ɒ ʃɛrɛɡbɛn nɛkfɛlɛtːɛ mɒnɒʃːéból iʃ hɒjlánɒk dávidhoz ɒ filistɛuʃokːɒl ɛɟütː ʃɒul ɛlːɛn mɛnt volnɒ hɒrt͡szolni dɛ nɛm ʃɛɡélːék õkɛt mɛrt tɒnát͡ʃot tɒrtván hɒzɒ ɒ filistɛuʃok fɛjɛdɛlmɛi ɒ fɛjünk vɛséʃévɛl foɡ visːɒmɛnːi ɒz ʃɒulhoz visːɒtérɛ ʃikláɡbɒ hɒjlánɒk hozːá ɒ mɒnɒʃːé fiɒi ɒdnɒ józɒbád jɛdiháɛl mikáɛl józɒbád ɛlihu éʃ ʃilːétɒi ɒ ɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl vɒló ɛzɛrɛk ɛlõljárói voltɒk ɛzɛk dávidnɒk ʃɛɡítʃéɡül voltɒk ɒz ɛlːɛnʃéɡ ʃɛrɛɡɛi ɛlːɛn mɛrt fɛjɛnként ɛrõʃ vitézɛk vɒlánɒk éʃ vɛzérɛk ɒ ʃɛrɛɡbɛn nɒkfɛlɛtːɛ mindɛn nɒp mɛnːɛk vɒlɒ dávidhoz hoɟ ʃɛɡítʃéɡérɛ lɛɟɛnɛk míɡ ʃɛrɛɡɛ nɒɟɟá ɒz iʃtɛnːɛk táborɒ ɛzɛk pɛdiɡ sámsɛrint ɒ viɒdɒlhoz késült ɛlõljárók ɒ dávidhoz mɛntɛk vɒlɒ hɛbronbɒn hoɟ ʃɒul hɛjɛtː ɒz orsáɡbɒn kirájjá válɒssák ɒz iʃtɛn íɡérɛtɛ sɛrint ɒ júdɒ fiɒi ɒ pɒiʒt éʃ viʃɛlénɛk hɒtɛzɛrɲolt͡sʒzáz vɒlɒ hɒrt͡szrɒ késɛn ʃimɛon fiɒi férfiɒk ɒ viɒdɒlrɒ hétɛzɛrsáz lévi fiɒi néɟɛzɛrhɒtsáz vɒlɒ jojɒdɒ iʃ ɒz fiɒi közötː ɛlõljáró vɒlɒ éʃ vɛlɛ háromɛzɛrhétsáz Éʃ ɒz ʃádók ɒ iɡɛn ɛrõʃ vɒlɒ éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒ husonkét fõɛmbɛr ɒ bɛnjámin fiɒi ɒ ʃɒul ɒcjɒfiɒi vɒlánɒk háromɛzɛr mɛrt méɡ ɒzok ʃokɒn hûʃéɡɛʃɛn vɒlɒ ɒ ʃɒul ɒz ɛfrɒim fiɒi húsɛzɛrɲolt͡sʒzáz iɡɛn vitézɛk ɒ ɒz nɛmzɛtʃéɡökbɛn hírɛʃ férfiɒk vɒlánɒk mɒnɒʃːénɒk félnɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl pɛdiɡ tizɛɲːolt͡szɛzɛr névsɛrint kijɛlöltɛténɛk hoɟ ɛlmɛnjɛnɛk éʃ dávidot kirájjá válɒssák iʒɒkhár fiɒi ɒ fɛliʃmɛrék ɒz ɒlkɒlmɒtoʃ hoɟ kɛlːɛnɛ izráɛlnɛk t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdniɛ kétsáz fõɛmbɛr éʃ ɒz rokonɒik hɒlːɡɒtnɒk vɒlɒ bɛsédjökrɛ zɛbulon fiɒi ɒ hɒrt͡szrɒ kimɛnõk mindɛn hɒdisɛrsámokːɒl fɛlkésülvɛ ötvɛnɛzɛrɛn vɒlánɒk késɛk ɒ viɒdɒlrɒ álːhɒtɒtoʃ sívːɛl nɒfthɒli nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl ɛzɛr fõɛmbɛr vɒlɒ éʃ vɛlɛk pɒiʒʒɒl ʃ kopjávɒl hɒrmint͡szhétɛzɛr vɒlɒ ɒ dániták ɒ ɒ viɒdɒlhoz késɛk vɒlánɒk husoɲːolt͡szɛzɛrhɒtsázɒn voltɒk ɒz Áʃɛr fiɒi ɒ hɒdɒkozók éʃ ɒz ütközɛthɛz késɛk nɛɟvɛnɛzɛrɛn vɒlánɒk jordánon lɒkozók ɒzɒz ɒ rúbɛniták ɡáditák éʃ ɒ mɒnɒʃːɛ nɛmzɛtʃéɡénɛk fɛlɛ mindɛn viɒdɒlhoz vɒló sɛrsámokːɒl ɛɟɛtɛmbɛn jötːɛk sázhúsɛzɛrɛn ndɛzɛk hɒdɒkozó férfiɒk ɒ viɒdɒlrɒ ɛlkésülvɛ ɛɟ értɛlɛmːɛl mɛntɛk vɒlɒ hɛbronbɒ hoɟ dávidot ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl fɛlɛtː kirájjá válɒssák ʃõt ɛzɛkɛn iʃ ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl ɛɟ sívːɛl ɒzon hoɟ dávidot kirájjá válɒssák Éʃ otː mɒrɒdánɒk dávidːɒl hɒrmɒdnɒpiɡ ʃ ɛsnɛk éʃ isnɒk vɒlɒ mɛrt ɒz ɒcjokfiɒi késítɛtːɛk vɒlɒ úɟ ɒ somsédʃáɡukbɒn lɛvõk máʃok iʒɒkháriɡ zɛbuloniɡ éʃ nɒfthɒliiɡ hoznɒk vɒlɒ kɛɲɛrɛkɛt sɒmɒrɒkon tɛvékɛn ösvérɛkɛn éʃ ɛlɛʃéɡɛt listɛt füɡét ɒsusõlõt olɒjɒt váɡóbɒrmokɒt juhokɒt sámtɒlɒn ʃokɒt mɛrt nɒɟ vɒlɒ izráɛlbɛn tɒnát͡ʃot tɒrtɒ pɛdiɡ dávid ɒz ɛzrɛdɛknɛk éʃ sázɒdoknɒk fɛjɛivɛl éʃ mindɛn ɛlõljárókːɒl mondɒ dávid izráɛl ɛɡés ɟülɛkɛzɛténɛk hɒ néktɛk tɛtsik éʃ hɒ ɒz ɒ iʃtɛnünktõl vɒn ɛl mindɛnfɛlé ɒ ɒcánkfiɒihoz ɒ otːhon mɒrɒdtɒk izráɛl mindɛn tɒrtomáɲɒibɒn ʃ vɛlök ɛɟütː ɒ pɒpokhoz éʃ lévitákhoz ɒz vároʃɒik éʃ vidékɛik sɛrint hoɟ iʃ ɟûljɛnɛk hozːánk hoɟ hozːuk idɛ ɒ iʃtɛnünknɛk hozːánk mɛrt ɒ ʃɒul idɛjébɛn nɛm vɛlɛ mondɒ ɒz ɛɡés ɟülɛkɛzɛt hoɟ úɟ kɛlː t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdni mɛrt iɡɒznɒk látːɒték ɛ doloɡ ɒz ɛɡés ɛlõtː Ösːɛɟûjté ɒzért dávid ɒz izráɛl Éɟiptomnɒk niluʃ fojóvizétõl foɡvɒ ɛɡésɛn hámátiɡ hoɟ ɒz iʃtɛnːɛk ɛlhozːák kirjáthjɛárimból lménɛ ɒzért dávid éʃ vɛlɛ ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl bɒɒlábɒ vɒɟ kirjáthjɛárimbɒ ɒ mɛj júdábɒn vɒn hoɟ onːɒn ɛlhozːák ɒz iʃtɛnːɛk mɛj ɒz nɛvérõl nɛvɛztɛtik ɒ ɒ khérubok hɛjhɛztɛték ɒz iʃtɛn ɒz ɒbinádáb ɛɟ sɛkérːɛ uzːɒ éʃ ɒhió vɛzɛtik vɒlɒ ɒ sɛkɛrɛt dávid pɛdiɡ éʃ ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl tánt͡szolnɒk vɒlɒ ɒz iʃtɛn ɛlõtː tɛljɛʃ ɛrõvɛl énɛkɛkːɛl t͡szitɛrákːɒl hɛɡɛdûkːɛl dobokːɒl t͡szimbɒlmokːɒl éʃ kürtökːɛl mikor pɛdiɡ jutotːɒk ɒ kidon sérûjéhɛz uzːɒ rɛá tɛvé kɛzét ɒ ládárɒ hoɟ mɛɡtɒrtʃɒ mɛrt ɒz félrɛ tértɛk vɒlɒ Éʃ ɒz Úrnɒk hɒrɒɡjɒ fɛlɡɛrjɛdɛ uzːɒ ɛlːɛn éʃ mɛɡvɛré hoɟ rɛá tɛvé kɛzét ɒ ládárɒ ʃ mɛɡhɒlɒ uɟɒnotː ɒz iʃtɛn ɛlõtː dávid iɡɛn mɛɡdöbːɛnɛ hoɟ ɒz ij t͡ʃɒpáʃːɒl ʃujtá uzːát ɒzért ɒzt ɒ hɛjɛt ɛ mɒi nɒpiɡ pérɛʃuzːánɒk nɛvɛzik Éʃ kɛzdɛ dávid ɒzon ɒ nɒpon iʃtɛntõl miképɛn mɛrjɛm mɒɡɒmhoz bɛvinːi ɒz iʃtɛn Éʃ nɛm bɛ dávid mɒɡához ɒ ɒ dávid vároʃábɒ hɒnɛm ɛlhɛjɛzé ɒzt ɒ ɡitːɛuʃ obɛdɛdom házábɒn Éʃ ɒz iʃtɛn ládájɒ obɛdɛdom házábɒn hónɒpiɡ éʃ mɛɡáldá ɒz obɛdɛdom éʃ mindɛnét vɒlɒmijɛ küldɛ pɛdiɡ hírám tíruʃ kirájɒ dávidhoz kövɛtɛkɛt t͡szédruʃfákɒt kõmívɛʃɛkɛt éʃ át͡ʃmɛʃtɛrɛkɛt hoɟ házɒt t͡ʃináljɒnɒk Éʃ mɛɡiʃmɛré dávid hoɟ ɒz mɛɡɛrõʃítɛtːɛ ɒ kirájʃáɡbɒn izráɛl fɛlɛtː mivɛlhoɟ iɡɛn fɛlmɒɡɒstɒltɒtotː vɒlɒ ɒz orsáɡɒ ɒz ɒz izráɛlért pɛdiɡ dávid méɡ töbː fɛlɛʃéɡɛt jɛruʒálɛmbɛn éʃ nɛmzɛ dávid méɡ töbː fiɒkɒt éʃ lɛáɲokɒt Éʃ ɛzɛk nɛvɛik ɒzoknɒk ɒ sülɛtːɛk jɛruʒálɛmbɛn ʃɒmːuɒ ʃobáb nátán éʃ ʃɒlɒmon ibhár ɛliʃuɒ éʃ ɛlpélɛt nóɡɒh néfɛɡ éʃ jáfiɒ ɛliʃámɒ bɛhɛljɒdɒ éʃ ɛlifélɛt mɛɡértvén pɛdiɡ ɒ filistɛuʃok hoɟ dávid kirájjá kɛnɛtɛtː fɛl ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl fɛlɛtː fɛljövénɛk ɒ filistɛuʃok hoɟ mɛɡkɛrɛʃːék dávidot mɛj dolɡot dávid mɛɡhɒlːotː ɒzonːɒl ɛlːɛnök mɛnt ɒ filistɛuʃok pɛdiɡ ɛljövén ɛlsélɛdénɛk ɒ réfɒim völɟébɛn ɒkːor dávid mɛɡkérdé ɒz iʃtɛnt fɛlmɛnjɛké ɒ filistɛuʃok ɛlːɛn éʃ kɛzɛmbɛ ɒdodé õkɛt Éʃ mondɒ ɒz mɛnj fɛl éʃ kɛzɛdbɛ ɒdom õkɛt fɛlmɛnénɛk ɒzért bɒálpɛráʃimbɒ éʃ otː dávid õkɛt mɛɡvɛré éʃ mondɒ dávid ɒz iʃtɛn ɛloslɒtá ɒz ɛlːɛnʃéɡɛimɛt ɒz kɛzɛm áltɒl ɒ vizɛknɛk osláʃát ɒzért nɛvɛzék ɒzt ɒ hɛjɛt bɒál pɛráʃimnɒk otː hɒɟák ɒz bálváɲ iʃtɛnɛikɛt éʃ dávid mɛɡpɒrɒnt͡ʃolá hoɟ mɛɡéɡɛʃːék ɒzokɒt fɛltámɒdánɒk ɒ filistɛuʃok éʃ ɒ völɟbɛn sétːɛrjɛskɛdtɛk ɒzért dávid iʃmét mɛɡkérdé ɒz iʃtɛnt éʃ mondɒ ɒz iʃtɛn nɛ mɛnj fɛl hɒnɛm ɛl éʃ mɛnj rɛájok ɒ sɛdɛrfák iráɲábɒn Éʃ hɒlːándod ɒ járáʃ doboɡáʃát ɒ sɛdɛrfák tɛtɛjén ɒkːor mɛnj ɒ viɒdɒlrɒ mɛrt ɒz iʃtɛn tɛ ɛlõtːɛd mɛɟɛn hoɟ mɛɡvɛrjɛ ɒ filistɛuʃok dávid ɒzért úɟ t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdék ɒ iʃtɛn mɛɡhɒɟtɒ éʃ váɡák ɒ filistɛuʃok ɡibɛontól foɡvɒ sintɛ ɡézɛriɡ Éʃ ɛltɛrjɛdɛ dávid hírɛ ɒz orsáɡokbɒn éʃ ɒz ɒdá ɒ tõlɛ vɒló félɛlmɛt mindɛn poɡáɲokrɒ t͡ʃináltɒtɒ pɛdiɡ dávid mɒɡánɒk házɒkɒt ɒz vároʃábɒn éʃ hɛjɛt késítɛtː ɒz iʃtɛn ládájánɒk éʃ ɒnːɒk ʃátort álːítotː fɛl mondɒ dávid nɛm sɒbɒd máʃnɒk ɒz iʃtɛn hɒnɛm t͡ʃɒk ɒ lévitáknɒk mɛrt ɒz õkɛt válɒstotːɒ hoɟ hordozːák ɒz iʃtɛn éʃ solɡáljɒnɒk mindörökːé Ösːɛɟûjté ɒzért dávid jɛruʒálɛmbɛ ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl hoɟ ɒz ɒz hɛjérɛ vitɛʃːɛ mɛjɛt sámárɒ t͡ʃináltɒtotː vɒlɒ Ösːɛɟûjté dávid ɒz fiɒit iʃ éʃ ɒ lévitákɒt kéhát fiɒi közötː vɒlɒ uriɛl éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒi sázhúsɒn vɒlánɒk mérári fiɒi közötː ɒʃájɒ ɒ éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒi kétsázhúsɒn vɒlánɒk ɡɛrʃon fiɒi közötː jóɛl ɒ éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒi sázhɒrmint͡szɒn vɒlánɒk ɛliʃáfán fiɒi közötː ʃɛmájɒ ɒ éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒi kétsázɒn vɒlánɒk hɛbron fiɒi közötː ɛliɛl ɒ éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒi ɲolt͡szvɒnɒn vɒlánɒk ɒz uzːiɛl fiɒi közötː vɒlɒ ɒmːinádáb éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒi sáztizɛnkɛtːɛn hivɒtá ɒkːor dávid ʃádók éʃ ɒbjátár pɒpokɒt ɒ léviták pɛdiɡ uriɛlt ɒʃáját jóɛlt ʃémáját ɛliɛlt éʃ ɒmːinádábot mondɒ ti vɒɟtok ɒ léviták t͡ʃɒládfõi sɛntɛljétɛk mɛɡ mɒɡɒtokɒt ʃ ɒ ɒcátokfiɒit éʃ viɟétɛk ɒz Úrnɒk izráɛl iʃtɛnénɛk ɒrːɒ ɒ hɛjrɛ ɒ mɛjɛt késítɛtːɛm sámárɒ nthoɟ kɛzdɛtːõl foɡvɒ nɛm mívɛlték ɛzt ɒz ɒ iʃtɛnünk t͡ʃɒpáʃt bot͡ʃátotː rɛánk mɛrt nɛm kɛrɛʃtük ɒ rɛndtɒrtáʃ sɛrint mɛɡsɛntɛlék ɒzért mɒɡokɒt ɒ pɒpok éʃ ɒ léviták hoɟ viɟék ɒz Úrnɒk izráɛl iʃtɛnénɛk Éʃ fɛlvɛvék ɒ léviták fiɒi ɒz iʃtɛn úɟ ɒ mózɛʃ mɛɡhɒɟtɒ ɒz Úrnɒk bɛsédɛ sɛrint ɒ rudɒkːɒl válːɒikrɒ Éʃ mondɒ dávid ɒ léviták fɛjɛdɛlmɛinɛk hoɟ álːítʃɒnɒk ɒz ɒcjokfiɒi énɛklõkɛt énɛklõsɛrsámokːɒl lɒntokːɒl t͡szitɛrákːɒl éʃ t͡szimbɒlmokːɒl hoɟ énɛkɛljɛnɛk fɛlɛmɛlt sóvɒl nɒɟ örömːɛl válɒsták ɒzért ɒ léviták hémánt ɒ jóɛl éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒi ɒʃáfot ɒ bɛrɛkiáʃ éʃ ɒ mérári fiɒi ɒ ɒzoknɒk ɒcjokfiɒi vɒlánɒk ɛtánt ɒ kúʃájɒ Éʃ vɛlök ɛɟütː ɒz ɒcjokfiɒit máʃod rɛndɛn zɒkɒriáʃt bént jɛáziɛlt ʃɛmirámótot jéhiɛlt unːit ɛliábot bɛnáját mɒɒʃéját mɒtːithját ɛlifélɛt miknéját obɛdɛdomot éʃ jɛhiɛlt ɒ ɒjtónálːók vɒlánɒk Énɛklõk hémán ɒʃáf éʃ ɛtán t͡szimbɒlmokːɒl hoɟ zɛnɡɛdɛzːɛnɛk zɒkɒriáʃ ɒziɛl ʃɛmirámót jéhiɛl unːi ɛliáb mɒɒʃéjɒ éʃ bɛnájɒ lɒntokːɒl ɒ sûzɛk módjárɒ mɒtːithjɒ ɛlifélɛ miknéjɒ obɛdɛdom jéhiɛl éʃ ɒzɒziáʃ hoɟ énɛkɛljɛnɛk t͡szitɛrákːɒl ɒ ɲolt͡szhúrú sɛrint Éʃ kénániáʃ ɒ léviták vɛzérɛ ɒz énɛkléʃbɛn iɡɒzɡɒtá ɒz énɛkléʃt mivɛl tudóʃ vɒlɒ bɛrɛkiáʃ éʃ ɛlkánɒ ɒ ládɒ ɛlõtː vɒló ɒjtónálːók vɒlánɒk bániáʃ pɛdiɡ éʃ jóʃɒfát nétɒnéɛl ɒmáʃɒi zɒkɒriáʃ bɛnájɒ éʃ ɛliézɛr pɒpok kürtölnɛk vɒlɒ ɒz iʃtɛn ládájɒ ɛlõtː obɛdɛdom éʃ jéhijɒ ɒ kɒpunálːók vɒlánɒk ɒ ládɒ mɛnːɛk vɒlɒ dávid pɛdiɡ ʃ ɒz izráɛl vénɛi éʃ ɒz ɛzrɛdɛk vɛzérɛi ɒ ɛlmɛnénɛk hoɟ fɛlviɟék ɒz sövɛtʃéɡénɛk ɒz obɛd ɛdom nɒɟ örömbɛn vɒlánɒk lõn pɛdiɡ ɒz iʃtɛn mɛɡʃɛɡíté ɒ lévitákɒt ɒkik ɒz sövɛtʃéɡénɛk visik vɒlɒ áldozánɒk tulokːɒl éʃ koʃːɒl dávid pɛdiɡ t͡ʃinált ruhábɒ vɒlɒmint ɒ léviták ɒ ɒ visik vɒlɒ ɒz énɛklõk iʃ éʃ kénániáʃ ɒ ɒz énɛkléʃ vɛzérɛ vɒlɒ énɛkɛlénɛk dávidon pɛdiɡ ɟolt͡ʃból t͡ʃinált ɛfód vɒlɒ Éʃ ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl ɒz sövɛtʃéɡénɛk nɒɟ örömːɛl kürtökːɛl trombitákːɒl t͡szimbɒlmokːɒl zɛnɡɛdɛzvén lɒntokːɒl éʃ t͡szitɛrákːɒl mikor pɛdiɡ imːár ɒz sövɛtʃéɡénɛk ládájɒ ɒ dávid vároʃábɒ jutotː mikál ɒ ʃɒul lɛáɲɒ kitɛkintɛ ɒz ɒblɒkon ʃ hoɟ dávid kiráj tánt͡szol éʃ víɡɒd sívébɛn mɛɡutálá mikor pɛdiɡ bɛvitːék ɒz iʃtɛn éʃ ɛlhɛjɛzék ɒzt ɒ ʃátor közɛpén ɒ mɛjɛt dávid ɒnːɒk sámárɒ fɛlálːítotː vɒlɒ áldozánɒk ɛɡésɛn éɡõ éʃ hálɒáldozɒtokːɒl ɒz iʃtɛn ɛlõtː Éʃ dávid ɛlvéɡɛztɛ ɒz ɛɡésɛn éɡõáldozɒtot éʃ ɒ hálɒáldozɒtot ɒz nɛvébɛn mɛɡáldá ɒ népɛt Éʃ ostoɡɒtɒ mindɛn izráɛlitánɒk férfinɒk úɟ ɒsːoɲnɒk ɛɟɛɟ kɛɲɛrɛt éʃ ɛɟɛɟ dɒrɒb húʃt éʃ ɛɟɛɟ kɒlát͡ʃot Éʃ rɛndɛlɛ ɒz ládájɒ ɛlé ɒ léviták solɡákɒt ɒ hirdɛʃːék tistɛljék éʃ dít͡ʃérjék ɒz urɒt izráɛl iʃtɛnét ɒʃáf vɒlɒ ɒ utánɒ máʃodrɛndɛn zɒkɒriáʃ jéhiɛl ʃɛmirámót jékhiɛl mɒtːithjɒ ɛliáb bɛnájɒ éʃ obɛdɛdom jéhiɛl lɒntokːɒl éʃ t͡szitɛrákːɒl ɒʃáf pɛdiɡ t͡szimbɒlmokːɒl énɛkɛl vɒlɒ továbːá bɛnájɒ éʃ jɒháziɛl pɒpok kürtölnɛk vɒlɒ süntɛlɛn ɒz iʃtɛn sövɛtʃéɡénɛk ládájɒ ɛlõtː ɒ nɒpon ɒdotː dávid ɛlõsör énɛkɛt ɒz Úrnɒk dít͡ʃérɛtérɛ ɒʃáfnɒk éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒinɒk kɛzébɛ dít͡ʃérjétɛk ɒz urɒt ʃɛɡítʃéɡül ɒz nɛvét hirdɛʃːétɛk mindɛn népɛk közötː ɒz nɒɟ dolɡɒit Énɛkɛljɛtɛk mondjɒtok dít͡ʃérɛtɛt bɛséljɛtɛk mindɛn t͡ʃudálɒtoʃ dolɡɒiról dit͡ʃɛkɛdjɛtɛk ɒz sɛnt nɛvébɛn örvɛndɛzːɛn sívök ɒzoknɒk ɒ ɒz urɒt kɛrɛʃik kɛrɛʃːétɛk ɒz urɒt éʃ ɒz ɛrõʃːéɡét kɛrɛʃːétɛk ɒz ort͡száját süntɛlɛn ɛmlékɛzːɛtɛk mɛɡ ɒz t͡ʃudálɒtoʃ dolɡɒiról ɒ mɛjɛkɛt t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdɛtː ɒz t͡ʃudáiról éʃ ɒz sájánɒk ítélɛtirõl izráɛlnɛk ɒz solɡájánɒk mɒɡvɒ jákóbnɒk ɒz válɒstotːjánɒk fiɒi ɛz ɒz ɒ iʃtɛnünk ɒz ɛɡés ɒz ítélɛtɛi ɛmlékɛzːɛtɛk mɛɡ örökːé ɒz sövɛtʃéɡérõl éʃ ɒz bɛsédérõl ɒ mɛjɛt pɒrɒnt͡ʃolt ɛzɛr nɛmzɛtʃéɡiɡ ɒ mɛjɛt sɛrzɛtː Ábrɒhámːɒl éʃ ɒz iʒáknɒk tɛtː ɛʃküjérõl ɛjɛt álːítɒ jákóbnɒk véɡzéʃül izráɛlnɛk örökːévɒló sövɛtʃéɡül mondván ɒ kɒnɒán nékɛd ɒdom hoɟ lɛɟɛn néktɛk örökʃéɡtɛk midõn sámsɛrint kɛvɛʃɛn vɒlátok iɡɛn kɛvɛʃɛn éʃ ʒɛlːérɛk ɒzon ɒ mɛrt járnɒk vɒlɒ ɛɟik nɛmzɛtʃéɡtõl ɒ máʃikhoz éʃ ɛɟik orsáɡból máʃ orsáɡbɒ méɡʃɛm ɛnɡɛdé ʃɛnkinɛk õkɛt bántɒni ʃõt méɡ ɒ kirájokɒt iʃ mɛɡbüntɛté érɛtːök ɒz fɛlkɛntjɛimɛt nɛ bántʃátok prófétáimnɒk ʃɛ ártʃɒtok mind ɛz ɛɡés énɛkɛljɛn ɒz Úrnɒk nɒprólnɒprɒ hirdɛʃːétɛk ɒz sɒbɒdítáʃát bɛséljétɛk ɒ poɡáɲok közötː ɒz dit͡ʃõʃéɡét mindɛn népɛk közötː ɒz t͡ʃudálɒtoʃ dolɡɒit mɛrt nɒɟ ɒz éʃ iɡɛn dít͡ʃérɛndõ éʃ rɛtːɛnɛtɛʃ mindɛn iʃtɛnɛk fɛlɛtː mɛrt ɒ poɡáɲoknɒk mindɛn iʃtɛnɛik t͡ʃɒk bálváɲok dɛ ɒz tɛrɛmtɛtːɛ ɒz ɛɡɛkɛt dit͡ʃõʃéɡ éʃ tistɛʃːéɡ vɒn ɛlõtːɛ ɛrõʃːéɡ éʃ víɡɒʃːáɡ ɒz hɛjén ɒdjɒtok ɒz Úrnɒk népɛknɛk nɛmzɛtʃéɡɛi ɒdjɒtok ɒz Úrnɒk dit͡ʃõʃéɡɛt éʃ ɛrõʃːéɡɛt ɒdjɒtok ɒz nɛvénɛk dit͡ʃõʃéɡɛt hozːɒtok ɒjándékot éʃ jõjːɛtɛk ɛlɛibɛ ɒz urɒt ɒ sɛntʃéɡ ékɛʃːéɡébɛn rɛtːɛɡjɛn ɒz ɛɡés ɒz ort͡szájától ɒ kɛrɛkʃéɡɛ iʃ mɛɡɛrõʃítːɛtik hoɟ nɛ inɡɒdozːék Örüljɛnɛk ɒz ɛɡɛk éʃ örvɛndɛzːɛn ɒ éʃ ɒ poɡáɲok közötː ɒz urɒlkodik zɛnɡjɛn ɒ tɛnɡɛr éʃ ɒz tɛljɛʃːéɡɛ örvɛndɛzːɛn ɒ mɛzõ éʃ mindɛn ɒ ɒzon vɒn ɒkːor örvɛndɛzni kɛzdɛnɛk ɒz ɛrdõnɛk ɒz ɛlõtː ɛljövɛnd mɛɡítélni ɒ földɛt tistɛljétɛk ɒz urɒt mɛrt iɡɛn mɛrt örökːévɒló ɒz irɡɒlmɒʃːáɡɒ Éʃ tɒrtʃ mɛɡ minkɛt sɒbɒdító iʃtɛnünk ɟûjtʃ ösːɛ minkɛt éʃ sɒbɒdítʃ mɛɡ ɒ poɡáɲoktól hoɟ ɒ tɛ sɛnt nɛvɛdɛt tistɛlhɛʃːük dit͡ʃɛkɛdhɛʃːünk ɒ tɛ dít͡ʃérɛtɛdbɛn Áldotː lɛɟɛn ɒz izráɛl iʃtɛnɛ foɡvɒ mindörökːé Éʃ mondɒ ɒ ʃokɒʃáɡ Ámɛn éʃ dít͡ʃéré ɒz urɒt hɒɟá ɒzért dávid ɒz sövɛtʃéɡénɛk ɒʃáfot éʃ ɒz ɒcjɒfiɒit hoɟ ɒ ládɒ ɛlõtː süntɛlɛn mindɛn nɒpon solɡáljɒnɒk obɛdɛdomot éʃ ɒz hɒtvɒɲːolt͡sz ɒcjɒfiát obɛdɛdom pɛdiɡ ɒ jɛdithun fiɒ éʃ hóʃát pɛdiɡ ɒjtónálːóknɒk pɒpot pɛdiɡ éʃ ɒz pɒp ɒcjɒfiɒit ɒz ʃátorɒ ɛlõtː hɒɟá ɒ mɒɡɒʃlɒton mɛj ɡibɛonbɒn vɒlɒ ɟ áldozːɒnɒk ɒz Úrnɒk süntɛlɛn éɡõáldozɒtːɒl ɒz éɡõáldozɒtnɒk mindɛn rɛɡːɛl éʃ ɛʃtvɛ éʃ hoɟ mindɛnt ɒ sɛrint t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdjɛnɛk ɒ mɛɡirɒtotː ɒz törvéɲébɛn mɛjɛt pɒrɒnt͡ʃolt vɒlɒ ɒz izráɛlnɛk iʃ éʃ jédutunt vɛlök hɒɟá éʃ töbːɛkɛt iʃ válɒstotː ɒ nɛvök sɛrint mɛɡnɛvɛztɛtːɛk hoɟ ɒz urɒt dít͡ʃérjék mɛrt ɒz irɡɒlmɒʃːáɡɒ örökːévɒló vɛlök hémánt éʃ jédutunt kürtökːɛl t͡szimbɒlmokːɒl éʃ ɒz iʃtɛn énɛkénɛk sɛrsámɒivɒl ɒ jédutun fiɒit pɛdiɡ kɒpunálːókːá tɛvé ɒkːor ɛltávozék ɒz ɛɡés ɒz dávid pɛdiɡ visːɒtérɛ hoɟ ɒz iʃ mɛɡáldjɒ lõn pɛdiɡ dávid ɒz házábɒn ülnɛ mondɒ nátán prófétánɒk t͡szédruʃfából t͡ʃinált házbɒn lɒkom ɒz sövɛtʃéɡénɛk ládájɒ pɛdiɡ ɒlɒtː ɒkːor mondɒ nátán dávidnɒk vɒlɒmi ɒ tɛ sívɛdbɛn vɒn t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdː mɛɡ mɛrt ɒz iʃtɛn vɛlɛd lɛɛnd ɒzon éjːɛl pɛdiɡ ɒz iʃtɛnːɛk sɒvɒ nátánhoz mɛnj ɛl éʃ mondː mɛɡ ɒz solɡámnɒk dávidnɒk ɛzt mondjɒ ɒz nɛ tɛ építʃ nékɛm házɒt lɒkáʃul nɛm lɒktɒm ɒtːól foɡvɒ házbɒn miótɒ ɒz izráɛl fiɒit kihoztɒm ɛ mɒi nɒpiɡ hɒnɛm ɛɟ hɒjlékból máʃ hɒjlékbɒ mɛntɛm éʃ ʃátorból ʃátorbɒ ɒ mɛj hɛjɛkɛn jártɒm ɒz izráɛl ɛɡés népévɛl sólotːɒmé vɒɟ ɛɟsɛr vɒlɒkinɛk ɒz izráɛl ɒ kiknɛk pɒrɒnt͡ʃoltɒm vɒlɒ hoɟ ɒz népɛmɛt lɛɡɛltɛʃːék miért nɛm t͡ʃináltɒtok nékɛm t͡szédruʃfából házɒt moʃt ɒzért ɛzt mondjɒd ɒz solɡámnɒk dávidnɒk ɛzt mondjɒ ɒ ʃɛrɛɡɛk urɒ válɒstotːɒlɒk téɡɛd ɒ mɛlːõl ɒ pástorkuɲhóból hoɟ léɟ vɛzérɛ ɒz népɛmnɛk ɒz izráɛlnɛk vɛlɛd voltɒm mindɛnütː vɒlɒhová mɛntél mindɛn ɛlːɛnʃéɡɛidɛt iʃ ɒ tɛ ort͡szád ɛlõl ɛlvɛstɛtːɛm ɛnːɛkfɛlɛtːɛ oj sɛrzɛtːɛm nékɛd ɒ minɛmû vɒn ɒ hɒtɒlmɒʃoknɒk ɒ ɒ vɒnːɒk lɒkóhɛjɛt iʃ ɒdtɒm ɒz népɛmnɛk ɒz izráɛlnɛk éʃ ɛlplántálám éʃ lɒkik ɒz hɛjén éʃ nɛm töbːé ʃ nɛm foɡják ɒz álnokʃáɡnɒk fiɒi ʃɒɲɒrɡɒtni ɒzɛlõtː Éʃ ɒtːól ɒz foɡvɒ hoɟ mɛɡpɒrɒnt͡ʃoltɒm hoɟ lɛɟɛnɛk ɒz népɛm ɒz izráɛl fɛlɛtː mindɛn tɛ ɛlːɛnʃéɡɛidɛt mɛɡɒlázám éʃ ɒzt iʃ jɛlɛntém nékɛd hoɟ ɒz házɒt nékɛd Éʃ lésɛn bɛtɛlnɛk ɒ tɛ élɛtɛd nɒpjɒi hoɟ ɒ tɛ ɒcáidhoz ɛlmɛnj ɒ tɛ mɒɡodɒt fɛltámɒstom tɛ utánɒd mɛj ɒ tɛ fiɒid vɒló lɛs éʃ ɒz orsáɡát mɛɡɛrõʃítɛm nékɛm házɒt éʃ mɛɡɛrõʃítɛm ɒz kiráji sékét mindörökːé lɛsɛk ɒcjɒ pɛdiɡ fiɒm lésɛn éʃ ɒz irɡɒlmɒʃːáɡomɒt tõlɛ ɛl nɛm vɛsɛm ɒ hoɟ ɒ tɛ ɛlõtːɛd vɒlótól ɛlvɛtːɛm hɒnɛm mɛɡɛrõʃítɛm ɒz házɒmbɒn éʃ ɒz orsáɡombɒn mindörökːé éʃ ɒz kirájisékɛ ɛrõʃ lɛs mindörökːé mind ɛ bɛsédɛk sɛrint éʃ ɛ látáʃ sɛrint sólɒ nátán dávidnɒk ménɛ ɒzért dávid kiráj éʃ lɛülɛ ɒz ɛlõtː éʃ mondɒ ki vɒɟok urɒm iʃtɛn ʃ mit͡ʃodɒ ɒz házɒm iʃ hoɟ ɛnɡɛmɛt ɛdːiɡ jutːɒtːál ʃõt méɡ ɛz iʃ kɛvéʃ ɛlõtːɛd iʃtɛn hɒnɛm ɛnːɛkfɛlɛtːɛ sólál jövɛndõt iʃ ɒ tɛ solɡád házɒ fɛlõl éʃ mɒɡɒʃ rɒnɡú ɛmbɛrt úɟ tɛkintɛtːél ɛnɡɛmɛt iʃtɛn kérhɛtnɛ dávid töbːɛt tɛ tõlɛd ɒ tɛ solɡádnɒk tistɛʃːéɡérɛ holotː tɛ iʃmɛrɛd ɒ tɛ solɡádɒt urɒm ɒ tɛ solɡádért éʃ ɒ tɛ sívɛd sɛrint t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdéd ɛ nɒɟ dolɡokɒt hoɟ kijɛlɛntéd mindɛzɛkɛt ɒ t͡ʃudálɒtoʃ dolɡokɒt urɒm nint͡ʃɛn ʃɛnki hɒʃonló hozːád éʃ nint͡ʃɛn iʃtɛn nálɒdnál töbː ɒ sɛrint ɒ fülɛinkːɛl hɒlːotːuk Éʃ kit͡ʃodɒ ojɒn ɒ tɛ népɛd ɒz izráɛl ɛɟ nɛmzɛtʃéɡ ɒ ɒ mɛjért ɛlmɛnt volnɒ ɒz iʃtɛn hoɟ mɛɡváltɒná mɒɡánɒk hoɟ mɒɡɒdnɒk nɒɟ éʃ rɛtːɛnɛtɛʃ nɛvɛt sɛrɛzː ɒ poɡáɲokɒt ɒ tɛ népɛd ɛlõl ɒ mɛjɛt Éɟiptomból mɛɡsɒbɒdítál Éʃ ɒz izráɛl ɒ tɛ népɛdːé tɛvéd mindörökːé éʃ tɛ urɒm iʃtɛnök lɛtːél moʃt ɒzért urɒm ɒ só ɒ mɛjɛt sólál ɒ tɛ solɡád fɛlõl éʃ ɒz házɒ fɛlõl ɛrõʃítːɛʃːék mɛɡ mindörökːé éʃ úɟ t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdjél ɒ sóltál mɒrɒdjon mɛɡ éʃ mɒɡɒstɒltɒʃːék fɛl ɒ tɛ nɛvɛd mindörökːé hoɟ mondhɒʃːák ɒ ʃɛrɛɡɛk urɒ ɒz izráɛl iʃtɛnɛ iʃtɛnɛ izráɛlnɛk éʃ dávidnɒk ɒ tɛ solɡádnɒk házɒ lɛɟɛn álːɒndó ɛlõtːɛd minthoɟ tɛ iʃtɛnɛm ɒ tɛ solɡádnɒk fülɛ hɒlːáʃárɒ mɛɡjɛlɛntɛtːɛd hoɟ házɒt t͡ʃináls ɛzokáért indulɒ mɛɡ ɒ tɛ solɡád hoɟ köɲörɡɛnɛ ɛlõtːɛd ʃt ɒzért urɒm tɛ vɒɟ ɒz iʃtɛn éʃ tɛ sólád ɛ dolɡot ɒ tɛ solɡád fɛlõl ʃt ɒzért tɛʃːék nékɛd mɛɡáldɒni ɒ tɛ solɡádnɒk hoɟ lɛɟɛn álːɒndó mindörökːé ɛlõtːɛd mivɛlhoɟ tɛ urɒm mɛɡáldotːɒd lɛɟɛn ɒzért áldotː mindörökːé ɛzɛk pɛdiɡ mɛɡvɛré dávid ɒ filistɛuʃokɒt éʃ mɛɡɒlázá õkɛt éʃ ɡáth vároʃát fɒluivɒl ɛɟütː ɛlvɛvé ɒ filistɛuʃok kɛzébõl ɒ moábitákɒt iʃ mɛɡvɛré éʃ ɒ moábiták dávidnɒk ɒdófizɛtõ solɡái lɛtːɛk továbːá mɛɡvɛré dávid hámátbɒn hɒdɒdézɛrt iʃ ʃóbánɒk kiráját ɛlindult vɒlɒ hoɟ ɒz ɛufrátɛʃ fojóvíziɡ vɛʃːɛ birodɒlmánɒk hɒtárát dávid pɛdiɡ ɲɛrɛ tõlɛ ɛzɛr sɛkɛrɛt éʃ hétɛzɛr lovɒʃt éʃ húsɛzɛr ɟɒloɡoʃt éʃ mindɛn sɛkɛrɛʃ lovɒknɒk inɒit ɛlvɒɡdɒltɒtá dávid éʃ t͡ʃɒk sáz sɛkérbɛ vɒlót tɒrtɒ mɛɡ ɒzokból Éʃ ɛljövénɛk dɒmɒʃkuʃból ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk hoɟ mɛɡʃɛɡélːɛnék hɒdɒdézɛrt ɒ ʃóbɒ kiráját lɛváɡɒ dávid ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk husonkétɛzɛr rɛndɛlɛ dávid tistːɒrtókɒt ʃiriábɒn ɒ dɒmɒʃkuʃ vɒn éʃ lɛtːɛk ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk dávidnɒk ɒdófizɛtõ solɡái Éʃ mɛɡʃɛɡíté ɒz dávidot mindɛnütː ɒ mɛrːɛ t͡ʃɒk mɛnt Éʃ vɛvé dávid ɒz ɒrɒɲ pɒiʒokɒt ɒ mɛjɛkɛt ɒ hɒdɒdézɛr solɡái viʃɛlénɛk éʃ jɛruʒálɛmbɛ Éʃ hozɒ dávid tibhátból éʃ kúnból ɒ hɒdɒdézɛr vároʃɒiból iɡɛn ʃok rɛzɛt ɒbːól t͡ʃinálá ʃɒlɒmon ɒ réztɛnɡɛrt ɒz oslopokɒt éʃ ɒ rézɛdéɲɛkɛt mikor mɛɡhɒlːotːɒ volnɒ pɛdiɡ tóhu ɒ hɒmáthbɛli kiráj hoɟ dávid mɛɡvɛrtɛ hɒdɒdézɛrnɛk ɒ ʃóbɒ kirájánɒk ɛɡés hɒdát dávid kirájhoz ɒz hɒdorámot hoɟ kösöntɛné éʃ mɛɡáldɒná mivɛlhoɟ mɛɡhɒrt͡szolt vɒlɒ hɒdɒdézɛrːɛl éʃ mɛɡvɛrtɛ vɒlɒ mɛrt tóhu iʃ hɒdɒkozik hɒdɒdézɛr ɛlːɛn Éʃ küldɛ dávidnɒk ʃok ɒrɒɲ ɛzüʃt éʃ rézɛdéɲt Éʃ dávid kiráj ɛzɛkɛt iʃ ɒz Úrnɒk sɛntɛlé ɒz ɛzüʃtːɛl éʃ ɒz ɒrɒɲɲɒl ɛɟütː ɒ mɛjɛt ɲɛrt vɒlɒ mindɛn poɡáɲoktól ɒz ɛdomitáktól ɒ moábitáktól ɒz ɒmːon fiɒitól ɒ filistɛuʃoktól éʃ ɒmálɛkitáktól ɒbiʃɒi pɛdiɡ ɒ ʃérujɒ fiɒ ɒz ɛdomiták ɒ ʃónɒk völɟébɛn mɛɡvɛrɛ tizɛɲːolt͡szɛzɛrɛt rɛndɛlɛ ɛdombɒn dávid tistːɒrtókɒt éʃ lɛtːɛk ɒz ɛdombɛliɛk dávidnɒk solɡái Éʃ mɛɡʃɛɡíté ɒz dávidot mindɛnütː ɒ mɛrːɛ t͡ʃɒk mɛnt Íɟ urɒlkodék dávid ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl fɛlɛtː éʃ ítélɛtɛt éʃ iɡɒʒáɡot solɡáltɒt vɒlɒ ɛɡés népénɛk joáb pɛdiɡ ʃérujɒ fiɒ ɒ ʃɛrɛɡ ɛlõljárójɒ jóʃɒfát ɒz ɒhilud fiɒ pɛdiɡ ɛmlékíró ʃádók ɒz ɒkhitub fiɒ éʃ ɒbimélɛk ɒz ɒbjátár fiɒ voltɒk ɒ pɒpok ʃɒuʃɒ ɒz íródɛák Éʃ bɛnájɒ ɒ jójɒdɒ fiɒ ɒ kɛrɛtɛuʃok éʃ pɛlɛtɛuʃok ɛlõljárójɒ ɒ dávid fiɒi pɛdiɡ ɛlʃõk ɒ kiráj mɛlːɛtː történt ɛzután hoɟ mɛɡhɒlt náháʃ ɒz ɒmːon fiɒinɒk kirájɒ éʃ urɒlkodék ɒz fiɒ hɛjɛtːɛ mondɒ dávid mindɛn jóvɒl lɛsɛk ɒ náháʃ hánunhoz mɛrt ɒz ɒcjɒ iʃ tɛtː vɛlɛm ɛzért dávid kövɛtɛkɛt küldɛ hozːá ɒ viɡɒstɒlnák ɒz ɒcjánɒk hɒlálɒ miɒtː éʃ ɛlmɛnénɛk ɒ dávid solɡái ɒz ɒmːon fiɒinɒk földérɛ hánunhoz hoɟ viɡɒstɒlnák ɒkːor mondánɒk ɒz ɒmːon fiɒinɒk fõɛmbɛrɛi hánunːɒk ɒzt hisɛdé hoɟ dávid ɒcád tistɛlɛtbõl küldötː hozːád viɡɒstɒlókɒt ɒvɒɟ nɛm ɒzért jötːɛké ɒz solɡái hozːád hoɟ ɒ földɛt mɛɡviʒɡálják ɛlpustítʃák éʃ kikémlɛljék mɛɡfoɡɒtá ɒzért hánun ɒ dávid solɡáit éʃ ɒzokɒt mɛɡɲirɒtá éʃ ruhájokɒt féliɡ ɛlmɛtsɛté ɒz dɛrɛkukiɡ éʃ úɟ bot͡ʃátá ɛl õkɛt ɛlmɛnénɛk pɛdiɡ éʃ értɛʃíték dávidot hoɟ ɒ férfiɒkːɒl Éʃ küldɛ ɛléjök mɛrt ɒzok ɒ férfiɒk fɛlɛtːɛ nɒɟ ɟɒlázɒtːɒl ilːɛtːɛtːɛk vɒlɒ éʃ ɛzt izɛné ɒ kiráj mɒrɒdjɒtok jérikhóbɒn míɡ sɒkálːɒtok mɛɡnövénd ɒkːor jõjːɛtɛk hozːám látván pɛdiɡ ɒz ɒmːon fiɒi hoɟ tistɛʃːéɡtɛlɛn dolɡot t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdtɛk vɒlɒ dávidːɒl küldénɛk hánun éʃ ɒz ɒmːon fiɒi ɛzɛr tálɛntom ɛzüʃtöt hoɟ foɡɒdjɒnɒk sɛkɛrɛkɛt éʃ lovɒɡokɒt méʃopotámiából ʃiriɒi mɒɒkából éʃ ʃóbából foɡɒdánɒk ɒzért mɒɡoknɒk hɒrmint͡szkétɛzɛr sɛkɛrɛt mɒɒkánɒk kiráját iʃ ɒz népévɛl ɛɟütː ɒ ɛljövénɛk éʃ járánɒk mɛdɛbɒ ɛlõtː ɒz ɒmːon fiɒi iʃ ösːɛɟûlénɛk ɒz vároʃɒikból éʃ jövénɛk ɒz ütközɛtrɛ ɒ mɛɡhɒlːotː dávid ɛlküldé joábot éʃ ɒ vitézɛk ɛɡés ʃɛrɛɡét ɒz ɒmːon fiɒi kimɛnvén t͡ʃɒtɒrɛndbɛ álːánɒk ɒ vároʃ kɒpujɒ ɛlõtː ɒ mɛj kirájok pɛdiɡ ʃɛɡítʃéɡrɛ jötːɛk vɒlɒ vɒlánɒk ɒ mɛzõn pɛdiɡ joáb hoɟ ɛlõl ɛlːɛnʃéɡ álːɒnɒ kiválɒstɒ ɒz ɛɡés izráɛl hɒrt͡szoʃɒi ɛɟnéháɲɒt éʃ ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk ɛlːɛn rɛndɛlé töbːi rését pɛdiɡ tɛʃtvérérɛ ɒbiʃɒirɒ éʃ ɛzɛk ɒz ɒmːon fiɒivɒl álːánɒk sɛmbɛ Éʃ mondɒ hɒ ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk rɒjtɒm ɛrõt vɛnːénɛk léɟ ʃɛɡítʃéɡɛmrɛ hɒ pɛdiɡ ɒz ɒmːon fiɒi rɒjtɒd vɛnːénɛk ɛrõt iʃ mɛɡʃɛɡélːɛk léɟ ɛrõʃ ʃõt lɛɟünk bátrɒk mindɲájɒn ɒ éʃ ɒ iʃtɛnünk vároʃɒiért ɒz pɛdiɡ t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdjɛ ɒzt ɒ tɛtsik hɒrt͡szrɒ indulɒ ɒzért joáb éʃ ɒz hɒdɒ ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk ɛlːɛn ɒ ɛlõtːɛ mɛɡfutɒmodánɒk ɒz ɒmːon fiɒi pɛdiɡ látːák hoɟ mɛɡfutɒmodánɒk ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk iʃ mɛɡfutɒmodánɒk ɒbiʃɒi ɛlõl ɒz tɛʃtvérɛ ɛlõl éʃ ɒ vároʃbɒ mɛnɛkülénɛk joáb pɛdiɡ visːɒtért jɛruʒálɛmbɛ látván pɛdiɡ ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk hoɟ ɒz izráɛl ɛlõtː mɛɡvɛrɛtːɛténɛk kövɛtɛkɛt küldénɛk éʃ kihozɒtːák ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛkɛt ɒ ɒ fojóvizɛn lɒknɒk vɒlɒ éʃ ʃófák ɒ hɒdɒdézɛr ʃɛrɛɡɛinɛk vɛzérɛ ɒz ɛlõljárójuk mikor pɛdiɡ ɒdák dávidnɒk ösːɛɟûjté ɒz ɛɡés izráɛlt éʃ ɒ jordán átmɛnvén hozːájok érkɛzék éʃ t͡ʃɒtɒrɛndbɛ álːotː ɛlːɛnök Éʃ t͡ʃɒtɒrɛndbɛ álːotː dávid ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk ɛlːɛn iʃ mɛɡütközénɛk vɛlɛ dɛ ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk mɛɡfutɒmodánɒk izráɛl ɛlõl éʃ lɛváɡɒ dávid ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk hétɛzɛr sɛkɛrɛt éʃ nɛɟvɛnɛzɛr ɟɒloɡot ɒnːɒkfɛlɛtːɛ ʃófákot ɒ ʃɛrɛɡ vɛzérét iʃ mɛɡölé mikor pɛdiɡ látːák ɒ hɒdɒdézɛr solɡái hoɟ izráɛl ɛlõtː lɛɟõzɛténɛk kötötːɛk dávidːɒl éʃ solɡálánɒk éʃ nɛm ɒkɒrák töbːsör ɒ ʃiriɒbɛliɛk mɛɡʃɛɡélːɛni ɒz ɒmːon fiɒit ɒz ɛstɛndõnɛk forduláʃávɒl ɒ kirájok hɒrt͡szbɒ mɛnːi soktɒk ɛlindítá joáb ɒ hɒdɒt éʃ ɛlpustítá ɒz ɒmːon fiɒinɒk Éʃ ɛlmɛnvén mɛɡsálːá rɒbːát dávid pɛdiɡ jɛruʒálɛmbɛn mɒrɒdɒ éʃ ɛlfoɡlɒlá joáb rɒbːát éʃ ɛlrontá ɒzt Éʃ ɛlvɛvé dávid ɒz kirájuknɒk fɛjérõl ɒ mɛj ɛɟ tálɛntom ɒrɒɲ ʃújú vɒlɒ ʃ mɛjbɛn dráɡɒkövɛk vɒlánɒk Éʃ dávid fɛjérɛ tɛtːɛ ɒzt ʃ ɒ vároʃból iʃ tɛmérdɛk ʒákmáɲt vitː ɛl vároʃ pɛdiɡ kihozɒtá éʃ fûréssɛl váɡɒtá éʃ vɒʃboronákːɒl éʃ fɛjsékːɛl Íɟ t͡ʃɛlɛkɛdék dávid ɒz ɒmːon fiɒinɒk mindɛn vároʃávɒl ɒzután mɛɡtérɛ dávid ɒz ɛɡés népːɛl jɛruʒálɛmbɛ ɛzután iʃmét hɒd támɒdɒ ɡézɛrbɛn ɒ filistɛuʃok ɛlːɛn éʃ ɒkːor mɛɡ ɒ huʃátitɛʃ ʃibːékɒi ɒz óriáʃok nɛmzɛtʃéɡébõl vɒló ʃipːɒit éʃ ijɛn mɛɡɒláztɒtánɒk hɒd ɒ filistɛuʃok ɛlːɛn ɒ mɛjbɛn mɛɡölé ɛlhɒnán ɒ jáir fiɒ ɒ ɡáthbɛli lákhmit ɒ
